h4.p: [03]^b^1^eb^^b^.^eb^ Aṭṭhakanipātassa ^a^V3.0189^ea^^a^M3.0203^ea^ paṭhame ^b^vaḍḍhitāyā^eb^ti bhāvanāpāripūrivasena paribrūhitāya. ^b^Punappunaṃ katāyā^eb^ti bhāvanāya bahulīkaraṇena aparāparaṃ pavattitāya. ^b^Yuttayānasadisakatāyā^eb^ti yathā yuttāajaññayānaṃ chekena sārathinā adhiṭṭhitaṃ yathāruci pavattati, evaṃ yathāruci pavattārahataṃ gamitāya. ^b^Patiṭṭhānaṭṭhenā^eb^ti sabbasampattiadhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena. ^b^Paccupaṭṭhitāyā^eb^ti bhāvanābahulīkārehi pati pati upaṭṭhitāya avijahitāya. ^b^Samantato citāyā^eb^ti sabbabhāgena bhāvanānurūpaṃ cayaṃ gamitāya. Tenāha ^b^‘‘upacitāyā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Suṭṭhu samāraddhāyā^eb^ti ativiya sammadeva nibbattigatāya.
[03]^b^Yo^eb^^a^V3.0190^ea^^b^ca mettaṃ bhāvayatī^eb^tiādīsu yo koci gahaṭṭho vā pabbajito vā. ^b^Metta^eb^nti mettājhānaṃ.

[03]^b^Appamāṇa^eb^nti bhāvanāvasena ārammaṇavasena ca appamāṇaṃ. Asubhabhāvanādayo viya hi ārammaṇe ekadesaggahaṇaṃ akatvā anavasesapharaṇavasena anodhiso pharaṇavasena ca, appamāṇārammaṇatāya paguṇabhāvanāvasena ca appamāṇaṃ. ^b^Tanū saṃyojanā hontī^eb^ti mettaṃ pādakaṃ katvā sammasitvā heṭṭhime ariyamagge adhigacchantassa sukheneva paṭighasaṃyojanādayo pahīyamānā tanū hontīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.

[03]Evaṃ kilesappahānañca nibbānādhigamañca mettābhāvanāya sikhāppattamānisaṃsaṃ dassetvā idāni aññepi ānisaṃse dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘ekampi ce’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^aduṭṭhacitto^eb^ti mettābalena suṭṭhu vikkhambhitabyāpādatāya byāpādena adūsitacitto. ^b^Mettāyatī^eb^ti hitapharaṇavasena mettaṃ ^a^M3.0204^ea^ karoti. ^b^Kusalī^eb^ti atisayena kusalavā mahāpuñño, paṭighādianatthavigamena khemī. ^b^Sabbe ca pāṇe^eb^ti ^b^ca^eb^-saddo byatireko. ^b^Manasānukampī^eb^ti cittena anukampanto. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – ekasattavisayāpi tāva mettā mahākusalarāsi, sabbe pana pāṇe attano puttaṃ viya hitapharaṇena manasā anukampanto pahukaṃ pahuṃ anappakaṃ apariyantaṃ catusaṭṭhimahākappepi attano vipākappabandhaṃ pavattetuṃ samatthaṃ uḷāraṃ puññaṃ ariyo parisuddhacitto puggalova karoti nipphādetīti. ^b^Sattabharita^eb^nti sattehi aviraḷaṃ, ākiṇṇamanussanti attho.

[03]^b^Saṅgahavatthūnī^eb^ti (saṃ. ni. ṭī. 1.1.120) lokassa saṅgaṇhanakāraṇāni. Nipphannasassato nava bhāge kassakassa datvā raññaṃ ekabhāgaggahaṇaṃ ^b^dasamabhāgaggahaṇaṃ^eb^. Evaṃ kassakā haṭṭhatuṭṭhā sassāni sampādentīti āha ^b^‘‘sassasampādane medhāvitāti attho’’^eb^ti. Tato orabhāge kira chabhāgaggahaṇaṃ jātaṃ. ^b^Chamāsika^eb^nti channaṃ channaṃ māsānaṃ pahonakaṃ. ^b^Pāsetī^eb^ti pāsagate viya karoti. Vācāya piyaṃ vācāpiyaṃ, tassa kammaṃ ^b^vācāpeyyaṃ^eb^. Sabbaso raṭṭhassa iddhādibhāvato ^b^khemaṃ. Nirabbudaṃ^eb^ coriyābhāvato. Iddhañhi raṭṭhaṃ acoriyaṃ. ^b^‘‘Niraggaḷa’’nti vuccati^eb^ apārutagharabhāvato.

[03]^b^Uddhaṃmūlakaṃ katvā^eb^ti ummūlaṃ katvā. ^b^Dvīhi pariyaññehī^eb^ti mahāyaññassa pubbabhāge pacchā ca pavattetabbehi dvīhi parivārayaññehi. ^b^Satta…pe… bhīsanassā^eb^ti sattanavutādhikānaṃ pañcannaṃ pasusatānaṃ māraṇena bheravassa pāpabhīrukānaṃ bhayāvahassa. Tathā hi vadanti –
[21]‘‘Chasatāni ^a^V3.0191^ea^ niyujjanti, pasūnaṃ majjhime hani;
[22]Assamedhassa yaññassa, ūnāni pasūhi tīhī’’ti. (saṃ. ni. ṭī. 1.1.120; a. ni. ṭī. 2.4.39);

[03]^b^Samma^eb^nti yugacchidde pakkhipitabbadaṇḍakaṃ. ^b^Pāsantī^eb^ti khipanti. ^b^Saṃhārimehī^eb^ti sakaṭehi vahitabbehi. Pubbe kira eko rājā sammāpāsaṃ yajanto sarassatinaditīre pathaviyā vivare dinne nimuggoyeva ahosi. Andhabālabrāhmaṇā gatānugatigatā ‘‘ayaṃ tassa saggagamanamaggo’’ti saññāya tattha sammāpāsaṃ yaññaṃ paṭṭhapenti. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘nimuggokāsato pabhutī’’^eb^ti ^a^M3.0205^ea^. Ayūpo appakadivaso yāgo, sayūpo bahudivasaṃ sādheyyo ^b^satrayāgo^eb^. Mantapadābhisaṅkhatānaṃ sappimadhūnaṃ ^b^‘‘vāja’’^eb^miti samaññā. Hiraññasuvaṇṇagomahiṃsādi ^b^sattarasakadakkhiṇassa^eb^. Sāragabbhakoṭṭhāgārādīsu natthi ettha aggaḷāti ^b^niraggaḷo^eb^. Tattha kira yaññe attano sāpateyyaṃ anavasesato anigūhitvā niyyātīyati.

[03]^b^Candappabhā^eb^ti (itivu. aṭṭha. 27) candimasseva pabhāya. ^b^Tārāgaṇāva sabbe^eb^ti yathā sabbepi tārāgaṇā candimasobhāya soḷasimpi kalaṃ nāgghanti, evaṃ te assamedhādayo yaññā mettassa cittassa vuttalakkhaṇena subhāvitassa soḷasimpi kalaṃ nānubhavanti, na pāpuṇanti, nāgghantīti attho.

[03]Idāni aparepi diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyike mettābhāvanāya ānisaṃse dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘yo na hantī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^yo^eb^ti mettābrahmavihārabhāvanānuyutto puggalo. ^b^Na hantī^eb^ti teneva mettābhāvanānubhāvena dūravikkhambhitabyāpādatāya na kañci sattaṃ hiṃsati, leḍḍudaṇḍādīhi na vibādhati vā. ^b^Na ghātetī^eb^ti paraṃ samādapetvā na satte mārāpeti na vibādhāpeti ca. ^b^Na jinātī^eb^ti sārambhaviggāhikakathādivasena na kañci jināti sārambhasseva abhāvato, jānikaraṇavasena vā aṭṭakaraṇādinā na kañci jināti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘na attanā parassa jāniṃ karotī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Na jāpaye^eb^ti parehi payojetvā paresampi dhanajāniṃ na kārāpeyya. Tenāha ^b^‘‘na parena parassa jāniṃ kāretī’’^eb^ti. Mettāya vā aṃso aviheṭhanaṭṭhena avayavabhūtoti ^b^mettaṃso^eb^.
[06]Mettāsuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^2-4^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dutiye ^a^V3.0192^ea^^b^ādibrahmacariyikāyā^eb^ti ādibrahmacariyameva ādibrahmacariyikā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘maggabrahmacariyassa ādibhūtāyā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ariyo^eb^ti niddoso parisuddho. Tuṇhībhāvo na titthiyānaṃ mūgabbatagahaṇaṃ viya aparisuddhoti ^b^ariyo tuṇhībhāvo. Catutthajjhāna^eb^nti ukkaṭṭhaniddesenetaṃ vuttaṃ, paṭhamajjhānādīnipi ariyo tuṇhībhāvotveva saṅkhaṃ ^a^M3.0206^ea^ gacchanti. ^b^Jāna^eb^nti idaṃ kammasādhananti āha ^b^‘‘jānitabbakaṃ jānātī’’^eb^ti. Yathā vā ekacco viparītaṃ gaṇhanto jānantopi na jānāti, passantopi na passati, na evamayaṃ. Ayaṃ pana jānanto jānāti, passanto passatīti evamettha daṭṭhabbo. Tatiyādīni suviññeyyāni.
[06]Paññāsuttādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^5^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pañcame ^b^lokassa dhammā^eb^ti sattalokassa avassaṃbhāvidhammā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘etehi muttā nāma natthi’’^eb^tiādi. Ghāsacchādanādīnaṃ laddhi ^b^lābho,^eb^ tāni eva vā laddhabbato ^b^lābho,^eb^ tadabhāvo ^b^alābho,^eb^ lābhaggahaṇena cettha tabbisayo anurodho gahito, alābhaggahaṇena virodho. Yasmā lohite sati tadupaghātavasena pubbo viya anurodho laddhāvasaro eva hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘lābhe āgate alābho āgatoyevā’’^eb^ti. Esa nayo yasādīsupi. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
[06]Paṭhamalokadhammasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^6-8^eb^^b^.^eb^ Chaṭṭhe adhikaṃ payasati payujjati etenāti ^b^adhippayāso,^eb^ savisesaṃ itikattabbakiriyā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘adhikappayogo’’^eb^ti. Sattamaṭṭhamesu natthi vattabbaṃ.
[06]Dutiyalokadhammasuttādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^9^eb^^b^.^eb^ Navame ^a^V3.0193^ea^ duvidhā kulaputtā jātikulaputtā ācārakulaputtā ca. Tattha ‘‘tena kho pana samayena raṭṭhapālo kulaputto tasmiṃyeva thullakoṭṭhike ^a^M3.0207^ea^ aggakulikassa putto’’ti (ma. ni. 2.294) evaṃ āgatā uccākulaputtā ^b^jātikulaputtā^eb^. ‘‘Saddhāyete kulaputtā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajitā’’ti (ma. ni. 3.78) evaṃ āgatā pana yattha katthaci kule pasutāpi ^b^ācārakulaputtā^eb^ nāma. Idha pana uccākulappasutataṃ sandhāya ‘‘kulaputtoti, bhikkhave, nandaṃ sammā vadamāno vadeyyā’’ti bhagavatā vuttanti āha ^b^‘‘jātikulaputto’’^eb^ti. Ubhohipi pana kāraṇehi tassa kulaputtabhāvoyeva. Sesamettha uttānameva.
[06]Nandasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^10^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dasame ^b^paṭicaratī^eb^ti paṭicchādanavasena carati pavattati. Paṭicchādanaṭṭho eva vā carati-saddo anekatthattā dhātūnanti āha ^b^‘‘paṭicchādetī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Aññenāñña^eb^nti pana paṭicchādanākāradassananti āha ^b^‘‘aññena kāraṇenā’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha ^b^aññaṃ kāraṇaṃ vacanaṃ vā^eb^ti yaṃ codakena cuditakassa dosavibhāvanaṃ kāraṇaṃ, vacanaṃ vā vuttaṃ, taṃ tato aññeneva kāraṇena, vacanena vā paṭicchādeti. ^b^Kāraṇenā^eb^ti codanāya amūlāya amūlikabhāvadīpaniyā yuttiyā vā. ^b^Vacanenā^eb^ti tadatthabodhakena vacanena. ‘‘Ko āpanno’’tiādinā codanaṃ vissajjetvāva vikkhepāpajjanaṃ ^b^aññenāññaṃ paṭicaraṇaṃ. Bahiddhā kathāpanāmanā^eb^ nāma ‘‘itthannāmaṃ āpattiṃ āpannosī’’ti vutte – ‘‘pāṭaliputtaṃ gatomhī’’tiādinā codanaṃ vissajjetvāti ayameva viseso. Yo hi ‘‘āpattiṃ āpannosī’’ti vutto ‘‘ko āpanno, kiṃ āpanno, kismiṃ āpannā, kaṃ bhaṇatha, kiṃ bhaṇathā’’ti vā vadati, ‘‘evarūpaṃ kiñci tayā diṭṭha’’nti vutte ‘‘na suṇāmī’’ti sotaṃ vā upaneti, ayaṃ ^b^aññenāññaṃ paṭicarati^eb^ nāma. Yo pana ‘‘itthannāmaṃ nāma āpattiṃ āpannosī’’ti puṭṭho ‘‘pāṭaliputtaṃ gatomhī’’ti vatvā puna ‘‘na tava pāṭaliputtagamanaṃ pucchāma, āpattiṃ pucchāmā’’ti vutte tato ‘‘rājagahaṃ gatomhi. Rājagahaṃ vā yāhi brāhmaṇagahaṃ vā, āpattiṃ āpannosīti. Taṃ tattha me sūkaramaṃsaṃ laddha’’ntiādīni vadati, ayaṃ ^b^bahiddhā kathaṃ apanāmeti^eb^ nāma ^a^M3.0208^ea^. ^b^Samaṇakacavaro^eb^ti samaṇavesadhāraṇena samaṇappatirūpakatāya samaṇānaṃ kacavarabhūtaṃ.

[03]^b^Kāraṇḍavaṃ^eb^^a^V3.0194^ea^ (su. ni. aṭṭha. 2.283-284) ^b^niddhamathā^eb^ti vipannasīlatāya kacavarabhūtaṃ puggalaṃ kacavaramiva anapekkhā apanetha. ^b^Kasambuṃ apakassathā^eb^ti kasambubhūtañca naṃ khattiyādīnaṃ majjhagataṃ pabhinnapaggharitakuṭṭhaṃ caṇḍālaṃ viya apakaḍḍhatha. Kiṃ kāraṇaṃ? Saṅghārāmo nāma sīlavantānaṃ kato, na dussīlānaṃ. Yato etadeva sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘tato palāpe vāhetha, assamaṇe samaṇamānine’’^eb^ti. Yathā palāpā antosārarahitā ataṇḍulā bahi thusena vīhī viya dissanti, evaṃ pāpabhikkhū anto sīlarahitāpi bahi kāsāvādiparikkhārena bhikkhū viya dissanti, tasmā ‘‘palāpā’’ti vuccanti. Te palāpe vāhetha opunatha vidhamatha, paramatthato assamaṇe samaṇavesamattena samaṇamānine. ^b^Kappayavho^eb^ti kappetha, karothāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^Patissatā^eb^ti sappatissā. Vaṭṭadukkhassa antaṃ karissatha, parinibbānaṃ pāpuṇissathāti attho.
[06]Kāraṇḍavasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Mettāvaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^11^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dutiyassa paṭhame ^b^verañjāyaṃ viharatī^eb^ti (pārā. aṭṭha. 1.1) ettha ^b^verañjā^eb^ti tassa nagarassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ, tassaṃ verañjāyaṃ. Samīpatthe bhummavacanaṃ. ^b^Naḷerupucimandamūle^eb^ti ettha ^b^naḷeru^eb^ nāma yakkho. ^b^Pucimando^eb^ti nimbarukkho. ^b^Mūla^eb^nti samīpaṃ. Ayañhi mūla-saddo ‘‘mūlāni uddhareyya antamaso usīranāḷimattānipī’’tiādīsu (a. ni. 4.195) mūlamūle dissati. ‘‘Lobho akusalamūla’’ntiādīsu (dī. ni. 3.305; pari. 323) asādhāraṇahetumhi. ‘‘Yāva majjhanhike kāle chāyā pharati, nivāte paṇṇāni patanti, ettāvatā rukkhamūla’’ntiādīsu (pārā. 494) samīpe. Idha pana samīpe ^a^M3.0209^ea^ adhippeto, tasmā naḷeruyakkhena adhiggahitassa pucimandassa samīpeti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. So kira pucimando ramaṇīyo pāsādiko anekesaṃ rukkhānaṃ ādhipaccaṃ viya kurumāno tassa nagarassa avidūre gamanāgamanasampanne ṭhāne ahosi. Atha bhagavā verañjaṃ gantvā patirūpe ṭhāne viharanto ^a^V3.0195^ea^ tassa rukkhassa samīpe heṭṭhābhāge vihāsi. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘verañjāyaṃ viharati naḷerupucimandamūle’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Paccuṭṭhānaṃ^eb^ (sārattha. ṭī. 1.2) nāma āsanā vuṭṭhānanti āha ^b^‘‘nāsanā vuṭṭhātī’’^eb^ti. Nisinnāsanato na vuṭṭhahatīti attho. Ettha ca ^b^jiṇṇe…pe… vayoanuppatte^eb^ti upayogavacanaṃ āsanā vuṭṭhānakiriyāpekkhaṃ na hoti. Tasmā ‘‘jiṇṇe…pe… vayoanuppatte disvā’’ti ajjhāhāraṃ katvā attho veditabbo. Atha vā paccuggamanakiriyāpekkhaṃ upayogavacanaṃ, tasmā ^b^na paccuṭṭhātī^eb^ti uṭṭhāya paccuggamanaṃ na karotīti attho veditabbo. Paccuggamanampi hi paccuṭṭhānanti vuccati. Vuttañhetaṃ ‘‘ācariyaṃ pana dūratova disvā paccuṭṭhāya paccuggamanakaraṇaṃ paccuṭṭhānaṃ nāmā’’ti. ^b^Nāsanā vuṭṭhātī^eb^ti iminā pana paccuggamanābhāvassa upalakkhaṇamattaṃ dassitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Vibhāvane nāma atthe^eb^ti pakativibhāvanasaṅkhāte atthe. ^b^Na abhivādeti vā^eb^ti na abhivādetabbanti vā sallakkhetīti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03]^b^Taṃ aññāṇa^eb^nti ‘‘ayaṃ mama abhivādanādīni kātuṃ araharūpo na hotī’’ti ajānanavasena pavattaṃ aññāṇaṃ. ^b^Olokento^eb^ti ‘‘dukkhaṃ kho agāravo viharati appatisso, kiṃ nu kho ahaṃ samaṇaṃ vā brāhmaṇaṃ vā sakkareyyaṃ garuṃ kareyya’’ntiādisuttavaseneva (a. ni. 4.21) ñāṇacakkhunā olokento. ^b^Nipaccakārāraha^eb^nti paṇipātārahaṃ. ^b^Sampatijāto^eb^ti muhuttajāto, jātasamanantaramevāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^Uttarena mukho^eb^ti uttaradisābhimukho. ^b^‘‘Sattapadavītihārena gantvā sakalaṃ dasasahassilokadhātuṃ olokesi’’^eb^nti idaṃ –

[08]‘‘Dhammatā esā, bhikkhave, sampatijāto bodhisatto samehi pādehi patiṭṭhahitvā uttarābhimukho sattapadavītihārena gacchati, setamhi chatte anudhāriyamāne sabbā disā viloketi, āsabhiñca vācaṃ bhāsatī’’ti (dī. ni. 2.31) –

[07]Evaṃ ^a^M3.0210^ea^ pāḷiyaṃ sattapadavītihārupari ṭhitassa viya sabbādisānulokanassa kathitattā vuttaṃ, na panetaṃ evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ sattapadavītihārato pageva disāvilokanassa katattā. Mahāsatto hi manussānaṃ hatthato muccitvā puratthimaṃ disaṃ olokesi, anekāni cakkavāḷasahassāni ekaṅgaṇāni ahesuṃ. Tattha devamanussā gandhamālādīhi pūjayamānā, ‘‘mahāpurisa, idha tumhehi sadisopi natthi, kuto uttaritaro’’ti āhaṃsu. Evaṃ catasso disā, catasso anudisā, heṭṭhā, uparīti dasapi disā anuviloketvā attano sadisaṃ adisvā ‘‘ayaṃ uttaradisā’’ti sattapadavītihārena ^a^V3.0196^ea^ agamāsīti veditabbā. ^b^Olokesi^eb^nti mama puññānubhāvena lokavivaraṇapāṭihāriye jāte paññāyamānaṃ dasasahassilokadhātuṃ maṃsacakkhunāva olokesinti attho.

[03]^b^Mahāpuriso^eb^ti jātigottakulappadesādivasena mahantapuriso. ^b^Aggo^eb^ti guṇehi sabbappadhāno. ^b^Jeṭṭho^eb^ti guṇavaseneva sabbesaṃ vuddhatamo, guṇehi mahallakatamoti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^Seṭṭho^eb^ti guṇavaseneva sabbesaṃ pasatthatamo. Atthato pana pacchimāni dve purimasseva vevacanānīti veditabbaṃ. ^b^Tayā^eb^ti nissakke karaṇavacanaṃ. ^b^Uttaritaro^eb^ti adhikataro. ^b^Patimānesī^eb^ti pūjesi. ^b^Āsabhinti^eb^ uttamaṃ. Mayhaṃ ^b^abhivādanādiraho puggalo^eb^ti mayhaṃ abhivādanādikiriyāya araho anucchaviko puggalo. Niccasāpekkhatāya panettha samāso daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Tathāgatā^eb^ti tathāgatato, tathāgatassa santikāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^Evarūpa^eb^nti abhivādanādisabhāvaṃ. ^b^Paripākasithilabandhana^eb^nti paripākena sithilabandhanaṃ.
[03]^b^Taṃ vacana^eb^nti ‘‘nāhaṃ taṃ brāhmaṇā’’tiādivacanaṃ. ‘‘Nāhaṃ arasarūpo, mādisā vā arasarūpā’’ti vutte brāhmaṇo thaddho bhaveyya. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘cittamudubhāvajananattha’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^Katamo pana so^eb^ti pariyāyāpekkho pulliṅganiddeso, katamo so pariyāyoti attho? ^b^Jātivasenā^eb^ti khattiyādijātivasena. ^b^Upapattivasenā^eb^ti devesu upapattivasena. ^b^Seṭṭhasammatānampī^eb^ti ^b^api^eb^-saddena pageva aseṭṭhasammatānanti dasseti. ^b^Abhinandantāna^eb^nti sappītikataṇhāvasena pamodamānānaṃ. ^b^Rajjantāna^eb^nti balavarāgavasena rajjantānaṃ. Rūpaparibhogena uppannataṇhāsampayuttasomanassavedanā rūpato nibbattitvā hadayatappanato ^a^M3.0211^ea^ ambarasādayo viya rūparasāti vuccanti. ^b^Āviñcantī^eb^ti ākaḍḍhanti. ^b^Vatthārammaṇādisāmaggiya^eb^nti vatthuārammaṇādikāraṇasāmaggiyaṃ. ^b^Anukkhipanto^eb^ti attukkaṃsanavasena kathite brāhmaṇassa asappāyabhāvato attānaṃ anukkhipanto anukkaṃsento.

[03]^b^Etasmiṃ panatthe karaṇe sāmivacana^eb^nti ‘‘jahitā’’ti etasmiṃ atthe ^b^tathāgatassā^eb^ti karaṇe sāmivacanaṃ, tathāgatena jahitāti attho. ^b^Mūla^eb^nti bhavamūlaṃ. ‘‘Tālavatthukatā’’ti vattabbe ‘‘oṭṭhamukho’’tiādīsu viya majjhepadalopaṃ katvā a-kārañca dīghaṃ katvā ‘‘tālāvatthukatā’’ti vuttanti āha ^b^‘‘tālavatthu viya nesaṃ vatthu katanti tālāvatthukatā’’^eb^ti. Tattha tālassa vatthu ^b^tālavatthu^eb^. Yathā ārāmassa vatthubhūtapubbo padeso ārāmassa abhāve ‘‘ārāmavatthū’’ti vuccati, evaṃ tālassa patiṭṭhitokāso samūlaṃ uddharite tāle padesamatte ṭhite ^a^V3.0197^ea^ tālassa vatthubhūtapubbattā ‘‘tālavatthū’’ti vuccati. ^b^Nesa^eb^nti rūparasādīnaṃ. Kathaṃ pana tālavatthu viya nesaṃ vatthu katanti āha ^b^‘‘yathā hī’’^eb^tiādi. Rūpādiparibhogena uppannataṇhāyuttasomanassavedanāsaṅkhātarūparasādīnaṃ cittasantānassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvato vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘tesaṃ pubbe uppannapubbabhāvena vatthumatte cittasantāne kate’’^eb^ti. Tattha ^b^pubbe^eb^ti pure, sarāgakāleti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^Tālāvatthukatāti vuccantī^eb^ti tālavatthu viya attano vatthussa katattā rūparasādayo ‘‘tālāvatthukatā’’ti vuccanti. Etena pahīnakilesānaṃ puna uppattiyā abhāvo dassito.

[03]^b^Aviruḷhidhammattā^eb^ti aviruḷhisabhāvatāya. Matthakacchinno tālo pattaphalādīnaṃ avatthubhūto tālāvatthūti āha ^b^‘‘matthakacchinnatālo viya katā’’^eb^ti. Etena ‘‘tālāvatthu viya katāti tālāvatthukatā’’ti ayaṃ viggaho dassito. Ettha pana ‘‘avatthubhūto tālo viya katāti avatthutālakatā’’ti vattabbe visesanassa paranipātaṃ katvā ‘‘tālāvatthukatā’’ti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Iminā panatthena idaṃ dasseti – rūparasādivacanena vipākadhammadhammā hutvā pubbe uppannakusalākusalā dhammā gahitā, te uppannāpi matthakasadisānaṃ taṇhāvijjānaṃ maggasatthena chinnattā āyatiṃ tālapattasadise vipākakkhandhe nibbattetuṃ asamatthā jātā, tasmā tālāvatthu viya katāti tālāvatthukatā rūparasādayoti ^a^M3.0212^ea^. Imasmiṃ atthe ‘‘abhinandantāna’’nti iminā padena kusalasomanassampi saṅgahitanti vadanti. ^b^Anabhāvaṃ katā^eb^ti ettha ^b^anu^eb^-saddo pacchāsaddena samānatthoti āha ^b^‘‘yathā nesaṃ pacchābhāvo na hotī’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^Yañca kho tvaṃ sandhāya vadesi, so pariyāyo na hotī^eb^ti yaṃ vandanādisāmaggirasābhāvasaṅkhātaṃ kāraṇaṃ arasarūpatāya vadesi, taṃ kāraṇaṃ na hoti, na vijjatīti attho. Nanu cāyaṃ brāhmaṇo yaṃ vandanādisāmaggirasābhāvasaṅkhātapariyāyaṃ sandhāya ‘‘arasarūpo bhavaṃ gotamo’’ti āha, ‘‘so pariyāyo natthī’’ti vutte vandanādīni bhagavā karotīti āpajjatīti imaṃ aniṭṭhappasaṅgaṃ dassento āha ^b^‘‘nanu cā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^Sabbapariyāyesū^eb^ti sabbavāresu. ^b^Sandhāyabhāsitamatta^eb^nti yaṃ sandhāya brāhmaṇo ‘‘nibbhogo bhavaṃ gotamo’’tiādimāha. Bhagavā ca yaṃ sandhāya nibbhogatādiṃ attani anujānāti, taṃ sandhāyabhāsitamattaṃ. ^b^Chandarāgaparibhogo^eb^ti chandarāgavasena paribhogo. ^b^Aparaṃ pariyāya^eb^nti aññaṃ kāraṇaṃ.

[03]^b^Kulasamudācārakamma^eb^nti kulācārasaṅkhātaṃ kammaṃ, kulacārittanti attho. ^b^Akiriya^eb^nti akaraṇabhāvaṃ ^a^V3.0198^ea^. ‘‘Anekavihitānaṃ pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammāna’’nti sāmaññavacanepi pārisesañāyato vuttāvasesā akusaladhammā gahetabbāti āha ^b^‘‘ṭhapetvā te dhamme’’^eb^tiādi, te yathāvuttakāyaduccaritādike akusaladhamme ṭhapetvāti attho. ^b^Anekavihitā^eb^ti anekappakārā.

[03]^b^Ayaṃ lokatantī^eb^ti ayaṃ vuḍḍhānaṃ abhivādanādikiriyalakkhaṇā lokappaveṇī. Anāgāmibrahmānaṃ alaṅkārādīsu anāgāmibhikkhūnañca cīvarādīsu nikantivasena rāguppatti hotīti anāgāmimaggena pañcakāmaguṇikarāgasseva pahānaṃ veditabbanti āha ^b^‘‘pañcakāmaguṇikarāgassā’’^eb^ti. Rūpādīsu pañcasu kāmaguṇesu vatthukāmakoṭṭhāsesu uppajjamāno rāgo ‘‘pañcakāmaguṇikarāgo’’ti veditabbo. Koṭṭhāsavacano hettha ^a^M3.0213^ea^ guṇa-saddo ‘‘vayoguṇā anupubbaṃ jahantī’’tiādīsu (saṃ. ni. 1.4) viya. ^b^Akusalacittadvayasampayuttassā^eb^ti domanassasahagatacittadvayasampayuttassa. Mohassa sabbākusalasādhāraṇattā āha ^b^‘‘sabbākusalasambhavassā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Avasesāna^eb^nti sakkāyadiṭṭhiādīnaṃ.

[03]^b^Jigucchati maññe^eb^ti ahamabhijāto rūpavā paññavā kathaṃ nāma aññesaṃ abhivādanādiṃ kareyyanti jigucchati viya, jigucchatīti vā sallakkhemi. Akusaladhamme jigucchamāno tesaṃ samaṅgibhāvampi jigucchatīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ samāpattiyā jigucchatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Samāpattī^eb^ti etasseva vevacanaṃ ^b^samāpajjanā samaṅgibhāvo^eb^ti. ^b^Maṇḍanajātiko^eb^ti maṇḍanakasabhāvo, maṇḍanakasīloti attho. ^b^Jegucchita^eb^nti jigucchanasīlataṃ.

[03]^b^Lokajeṭṭhakakamma^eb^nti lokajeṭṭhakānaṃ kattabbakammaṃ, loke vā seṭṭhasammataṃ kammaṃ. ^b^Tatrā^eb^ti tesu dvīsupi atthavikappesu. Padābhihito attho ^b^padattho,^eb^ byañjanatthoti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^Vinayaṃ vā arahatī^eb^ti ettha vinayanaṃ ^b^vinayo,^eb^ niggaṇhananti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘niggahaṃ arahatīti vuttaṃ hotī’’^eb^ti. Nanu ca paṭhamaṃ vuttesu dvīsupi atthavikappesu sakatthe arahatthe ca taddhitapaccayo saddalakkhaṇato dissati, na pana ‘‘vinayāya dhammaṃ desetī’’ti imasmiṃ atthe. Tasmā kathamettha taddhitapaccayoti āha ^b^‘‘vicitrā hi taddhitavuttī’’^eb^ti. Vicitratā cettha lokappamāṇato veditabbā. Tathā hi yasmiṃ yasmiṃ atthe taddhitappayogo lokassa, tattha tattha taddhitavutti lokato siddhāti vicitrā taddhitavutti, tasmā yathā ‘‘mā saddamakāsī’’ti vadanto ‘‘māsaddiko’’ti vuccati, evaṃ vinayāya dhammaṃ desetīti venayikoti vuccatīti adhippāyo.

[03]^b^Kapaṇapuriso^eb^ti guṇavirahitatāya dīnamanusso. ^b^Byañjanāni avicāretvā^eb^ti tissadattādisaddesu ^a^V3.0199^ea^ viya ‘‘imasmiṃ atthe ayaṃ nāma paccayo’’ti evaṃ byañjanavicāraṃ akatvā, anipphannapāṭipadikavasenāti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03]^b^‘‘Devalokagabbhasampattiyā’’^eb^ti vatvāpi ṭhapetvā bhummadeve sesadevesu gabbhaggahaṇassa abhāvato paṭisandhiyevettha gabbhasampattīti veditabbāti vuttamevatthaṃ vivaritvā dassento āha ^b^‘‘devalokapaṭisandhipaṭilābhāya saṃvattatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Assā^eb^ti abhivādanādisāmīcikammassa. ^b^Mātukucchismiṃ^eb^^a^M3.0214^ea^^b^paṭisandhiggahaṇe dosaṃ dassento^eb^ti mātito aparisuddhabhāvaṃ dassento, akkositukāmassa dāsiyā puttoti dāsikucchimhi nibbattabhāve dosaṃ dassetvā akkosanaṃ viya bhagavato mātukucchismiṃ paṭisandhiggahaṇe dosaṃ dassetvā akkosantopi evamāhāti adhippāyo. ^b^Gabbhato^eb^ti devalokappaṭisandhito. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘abhabbo devalokūpapattiṃ pāpuṇitunti adhippāyo’’^eb^ti. ‘‘Hīno vā gabbho assāti apagabbho’’ti imassa viggahassa ekena pariyāyena adhippāyaṃ dassento āha ^b^‘‘devalokagabbhaparibāhirattā āyatiṃ hīnagabbhapaṭilābhabhāgī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Iti^eb^-saddo hetuattho. Yasmā āyatimpi hīnagabbhapaṭilābhabhāgī, tasmā hīno vā gabbho assāti apagabbhoti adhippāyo. Puna tasseva viggahassa ‘‘kodhavasena…pe… dassento’’ti heṭṭhā vuttanayassa anurūpaṃ katvā adhippāyaṃ dassento āha ^b^‘‘hīno vāssa mātukucchismiṃ gabbhavāso ahosīti adhippāyo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Gabbha^eb^-saddo atthi mātukucchipariyāyo ‘‘gabbhe vasati māṇavo’’tiādīsu (jā. 1.15.363) viya. Atthi mātukucchismiṃ nibbattasattapariyāyo ‘‘antamaso gabbhapātanaṃ upādāyā’’tiādīsu (mahāva. 129) viya. Tattha mātukucchipariyāyaṃ gahetvā atthaṃ dassento āha ^b^‘‘anāgate gabbhaseyyā’’^eb^ti. Gabbhe seyyā ^b^gabbhaseyyā. Anuttarena maggenā^eb^ti aggamaggena. Kammakilesānaṃ maggena vihatattā āha ^b^‘‘vihatakāraṇattā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Itarā tissopī^eb^ti aṇḍajasaṃsedajaopapātikā. Ettha ca yadipi ‘‘apagabbho’’ti imassa anurūpato gabbhaseyyā eva vattabbā, pasaṅgato pana labbhamānaṃ sabbampi vattuṃ vaṭṭatīti punabbhavābhinibbattipi vuttāti veditabbā.

[03]Idāni sattapariyāyassa ^b^gabbha^eb^-saddassa vasena viggahanānattaṃ dassento āha ^b^‘‘apicā’’^eb^tiādi. Imasmiṃ pana vikappe gabbhaseyyā punabbhavābhinibbattīti ubhayampi gabbhaseyyavaseneva vuttantipi vadanti. Nanu ca ‘‘āyatiṃ gabbhaseyyā pahīnā’’ti vuttattā gabbhassa seyyā eva pahīnā, na pana gabbhoti āpajjatīti āha ^b^‘‘yathā cā’’^eb^tiādi. Atha ‘‘abhinibbattī’’ti ettakameva avatvā punabbhavaggahaṇaṃ kimatthanti āha ^b^‘‘abhinibbatti ca nāmā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Apunabbhavabhūtā^eb^ti khaṇe khaṇe uppajjamānānaṃ dhammānaṃ abhinibbatti.

[03]^b^Dhammadhātu^eb^nti ^a^V3.0200^ea^^a^M3.0215^ea^ ettha dhamme anavasese dhāreti yāthāvato upadhāretīti dhammadhātu, dhammānaṃ yathāsabhāvato avabujjhanasabhāvo, sabbaññutaññāṇassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. ^b^Paṭivijjhitvā^eb^ti sacchikatvā, paṭilabhitvāti attho, paṭilābhahetūti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^Desanāvilāsappatto hotī^eb^ti rucivasena parivattetvā dassetuṃ samatthatā desanāvilāso, taṃ patto adhigatoti attho. ^b^Karuṇāvipphāra^eb^nti sabbasattesu mahākaruṇāya pharaṇaṃ. Tādilakkhaṇameva puna upamāya vibhāvetvā dassento āha ^b^‘‘pathavīsamacittata’’^eb^nti. Yathā pathavī suciasucinikkhepacchedanabhedanādīsu na vikampati, anurodhavirodhaṃ na pāpuṇāti, evaṃ iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu lābhālābhādīsu anurodhavirodhappahānato avikampitacittatāya pathavīsamacittatanti attho. ^b^Akuppadhammata^eb^nti ettha akuppadhammo nāma phalasamāpattīti keci vadanti. ‘‘Paresu pana akkosantesupi attano pathavīsamacittatāya akuppanasabhāvatanti evamettha attho gahetabbo’’ti amhākaṃ khanti. ^b^Jarāya anusaṭa^eb^nti jarāya paliveṭhitaṃ. Brāhmaṇassa vuddhatāya āsannavuttimaraṇanti sambhāvanavasena ^b^‘‘ajja maritvā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^‘‘Mahantena kho pana ussāhenā’’^eb^ti sādhu kho pana tathārūpānaṃ arahataṃ dassanaṃ hotī’’ti evaṃ sañjātamahussāhena. ^b^Appaṭisamaṃ purejātabhāva^eb^nti anaññasādhāraṇaṃ purejātabhāvaṃ. Natthi etassa paṭisamoti ^b^appaṭisamo,^eb^ purejātabhāvo.
[03]^b^Pakkhe vidhunantā^eb^ti patte cālentā. ^b^Nikkhamantāna^eb^nti niddhāraṇe sāmivacanaṃ, nikkhantesūti attho.

[03]^b^So jeṭṭho iti assa vacanīyo^eb^ti yo paṭhamataraṃ aṇḍakosato nikkhanto kukkuṭapotako, so jeṭṭhoti vacanīyo assa, bhaveyyāti attho. ^b^Sampaṭipādento^eb^ti saṃsandento. Tibhūmapariyāpannāpi sattā avijjākosassa anto paviṭṭhā tattha tattha appahīnāya avijjāya veṭhitattāti āha ^b^‘‘avijjākosassa anto paviṭṭhesu sattesū’’^eb^ti ^b^aṇḍakosa^eb^nti bījakapālaṃ. ^b^Lokasannivāse^eb^ti lokoyeva saṅgamma samāgamma nivāsanaṭṭhena lokasannivāso, sattanikāyo. ^b^Sammāsambodhi^eb^nti ettha ^b^sammā^eb^ti aviparītattho, ^b^saṃ^eb^-saddo sāmanti imamatthaṃ dīpeti. Tasmā sammā aviparītenākārena ^a^M3.0216^ea^ sayameva cattāri saccāni bujjhati paṭivijjhatīti ^b^sammāsambodhī^eb^ti maggo vuccati. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sammā sāmañca bodhi’’^eb^nti, sammā sayameva ca bujjhanakanti attho. ^b^Sammā^eb^ti vā pasatthavacano, ^b^saṃ^eb^-saddo sundaravacanoti āha ^b^‘‘atha vā pasatthaṃ sundarañca bodhi’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^Asabbaguṇadāyakattā^eb^ti sabbaguṇānaṃ adāyakattā. Sabbaguṇe na dadātīti hi ^b^asabbaguṇadāyako^eb^^a^V3.0201^ea^, asamatthasamāsoyaṃ gamakattā yathā ‘‘asūriyapassāni mukhānī’’ti. ^b^Tisso vijjā^eb^ti upanissayavato saheva arahattaphalena tisso vijjā deti. Nanu cettha tīsu vijjāsu āsavakkhayañāṇassa maggapariyāpannattā kathametaṃ yujjati ‘‘maggo tisso vijjā detī’’ti? Nāyaṃ doso. Satipi āsavakkhayañāṇassa maggapariyāpannabhāve aṭṭhaṅgike magge sati maggañāṇena saddhiṃ tisso vijjā paripuṇṇā hontīti ‘‘maggo tisso vijjā detī’’ti vuccati. ^b^Cha abhiññā^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. ^b^Sāvakapāramiñāṇa^eb^nti aggasāvakehi paṭilabhitabbameva lokiyalokuttarañāṇaṃ. ^b^Paccekabodhiñāṇa^eb^nti etthāpi imināva nayena attho veditabbo. ^b^Abbhaññāsi^eb^nti jāniṃ. Jānanañca na anussavādivasenāti āha ^b^‘‘paṭivijjhi’’^eb^nti, paccakkhamakāsinti attho. Paṭivedhopi na dūre ṭhitassa lakkhaṇappaṭivedho viyāti āha ^b^‘‘pattomhī’’^eb^ti, pāpuṇinti attho. Pāpuṇanañca na sayaṃ gantvāti āha ^b^‘‘adhigatomhī’’^eb^ti, santāne uppādanavasena paṭilabhinti attho.

[03]^b^Opammasampaṭipādana^eb^nti opammatthassa upameyyena sammadeva paṭipādanaṃ. ^b^Atthenā^eb^ti upameyyatthena. Yathā kukkuṭiyā aṇḍesu tividhakiriyākaraṇaṃ kukkuṭacchāpakānaṃ aṇḍakosato nikkhamanassa mūlakāraṇaṃ, evaṃ bodhisattabhūtassa bhagavato tividhānupassanākaraṇaṃ avijjaṇḍakosato nikkhamanassa mūlakāraṇanti āha ^b^‘‘yathā hi tassā kukkuṭiyā…pe… tividhānupassanākaraṇa’’^eb^nti. ^b^‘‘Santāne’’^eb^ti vuttattā aṇḍasadisatā santānassa, bahi nikkhantakukkuṭacchāpakasadisatā buddhaguṇānaṃ, buddhaguṇāti ca atthato buddhoyeva ‘‘tathāgatassa kho etaṃ, vāseṭṭha, adhivacanaṃ dhammakāyo itipī’’ti vacanato. ^b^Avijjaṇḍakosassa tanubhāvo^eb^ti balavavipassanāvasena avijjaṇḍakosassa tanubhāvo, paṭicchādanasāmaññena ca avijjāya aṇḍakosasadisatā. Mudubhūtassapi kharabhāvāpatti hotīti ^a^M3.0217^ea^ tannivattanatthaṃ ^b^‘‘thaddhakharabhāvo’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Tikkhakharavippasannasūrabhāvo^eb^ti ettha pariggayhamānesu saṅkhāresu vipassanāñāṇassa samādhindriyavasena sukhānuppaveso ^b^tikkhatā,^eb^ anupavisitvāpi satindriyavasena anatikkamanato akuṇṭhatā ^b^kharabhāvo^eb^. Tikkhopi hi ekacco saro lakkhaṃ patvā kuṇṭho hoti, na tathā idaṃ. Satipi kharabhāve sukhumappavattivasena kilesasamudācārasaṅkhobharahitatāya saddhindriyavasena ^b^pasannabhāvo,^eb^ satipi pasannabhāve antarā anosakkitvā kilesapaccatthikānaṃ suṭṭhu abhibhavanato vīriyindriyavasena ^b^sūrabhāvo^eb^ veditabbo. Evamimehi pakārehi saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇameva gahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Vipassanāñāṇassa pariṇāmakālo^eb^ti vipassanāya vuṭṭhānagāminibhāvāpatti. Tadā ca sā maggañāṇagabbhaṃ dhārentī viya hotīti āha ^b^‘‘gabbhaggahaṇakālo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Gabbhaṃ gaṇhāpetvā^eb^ti saṅkhārupekkhāya anantaraṃ sikhāppattānulomavipassanāvasena maggavijāyanatthaṃ gabbhaṃ gaṇhāpetvā. ^b^Abhiññāpakkhe^eb^ti ^a^V3.0202^ea^ lokiyābhiññāpakkhe. Lokuttarābhiññā hi avijjaṇḍakosaṃ padālitā. Potthakesu pana katthaci ‘‘chābhiññāpakkhe’’ti likhanti, so apāṭhoti veditabbo.
[03]^b^Jeṭṭho seṭṭho^eb^ti vuddhatamattā jeṭṭho, sabbaguṇehi uttamattā pasatthatamoti seṭṭho.

[03]Idāni ‘‘āraddhaṃ kho pana me, brāhmaṇa, vīriya’’ntiādikāya desanāya anusandhiṃ dassento āha ^b^‘‘evaṃ bhagavā’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha ^b^pubbabhāgato pabhutī^eb^ti bhāvanāya pubbabhāgīyavīriyārambhādito paṭṭhāya. ^b^Muṭṭhassatinā^eb^ti vinaṭṭhassatinā, sativirahitenāti attho. ^b^Sāraddhakāyenā^eb^ti sadarathakāyena. ^b^Bodhimaṇḍe^eb^ti bodhisaṅkhātassa ñāṇassa maṇḍabhāvappatte ṭhāne. Bodhīti hi paññā vuccati. Sā ettha maṇḍā pasannā jātāti so padeso ‘‘bodhimaṇḍo’’ti paññāto. ^b^Paggahita^eb^nti ārambhaṃ sithilaṃ akatvā daḷhaparakkamasaṅkhātussahanabhāvena gahitaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘asithilappavattita’’^eb^nti. ^b^Asallīna^eb^nti asaṅkucitaṃ kosajjavasena saṅkocaṃ anāpannaṃ. ^b^Upaṭṭhitā^eb^ti ogāhanasaṅkhātena apilāpanabhāvena ārammaṇaṃ upagantvā ṭhitā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ārammaṇābhimukhībhāvenā’’^eb^ti. Sammosassa viddhaṃsanavasena pavattiyā na sammuṭṭhāti ^b^asammuṭṭhā^eb^. Kiñcāpi cittappassaddhivasena cittameva passaddhaṃ, kāyappassaddhivaseneva ca kāyo passaddho hoti ^a^M3.0218^ea^, tathāpi yasmā kāyappassaddhi uppajjamānā cittappassaddhiyā saheva uppajjati, na vinā, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘kāyacittappassaddhivasenā’’^eb^ti. Kāyappassaddhiyā ubhayesampi kāyānaṃ passambhanāvahattā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘rūpakāyopi passaddhoyeva hotī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^So ca kho^eb^ti so ca kho kāyo. ^b^Vigatadaratho^eb^ti vigatakilesadaratho. Nāmakāye hi vigatadarathe rūpakāyopi vūpasantadarathapariḷāho hoti. ^b^Sammā āhita^eb^nti nānārammaṇesu vidhāvanasaṅkhātaṃ vikkhepaṃ vicchinditvā ekasmiṃyeva ārammaṇe avikkhittabhāvāpādanena sammadeva āhitaṃ ṭhapitaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘suṭṭhu ṭhapita’’^eb^ntiādi. Cittassa anekaggabhāvo vikkhepavasena cañcalatā, sā sati ekaggatāya na hotīti āha ^b^‘‘ekaggaṃ acalaṃ nipphandana’’^eb^nti. ^b^Ettāvatā^eb^ti ‘‘āraddhaṃ kho panā’’tiādinā vīriyasatipassaddhisamādhīnaṃ kiccasiddhidassanena. Nanu ca saddhāpaññānampi kiccasiddhi jhānassa pubbabhāgappaṭipadāya icchitabbāti? Saccaṃ, sā pana nānantarikabhāvena avuttasiddhāti na gahitā. Asati hi saddhāya vīriyārambhādīnaṃ asambhavoyeva, paññāpariggahe ca nesaṃ asati ñāyārambhādibhāvo na siyā, tathā asallīnāsammosatādayo vīriyādīnanti asallīnatādiggahaṇenevettha paññākiccasiddhi ^a^V3.0203^ea^ gahitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Jhānabhāvanāyaṃ vā samādhikiccaṃ adhikaṃ icchitabbanti dassetuṃ samādhipariyosānāva jhānassa pubbabhāgappaṭipadā kathitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03]Atītabhave khandhā tappaṭibaddhāni nāmagottāni ca sabbaṃ pubbenivāsaṃtveva gahitanti āha ^b^‘‘kiṃ viditaṃ karoti? Pubbenivāsa’’^eb^nti. Moho paṭicchādakaṭṭhena tamo viya tamoti āha ^b^‘‘sveva moho’’^eb^ti. ^b^Obhāsakaraṇaṭṭhenā^eb^ti kātabbato karaṇaṃ. Obhāsova karaṇaṃ ^b^obhāsakaraṇaṃ^eb^. Attano paccayehi obhāsabhāvena nibbattetabbaṭṭhenāti attho. ^b^Sesaṃ pasaṃsāvacana^eb^nti paṭipakkhavidhamanapavattivisesānaṃ bodhanato vuttaṃ. ^b^Avijjā vihatā^eb^ti etena vijānanaṭṭhena vijjāti ayampi attho dīpitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^‘‘Kasmā? Yasmā vijjā uppannā’’^eb^ti etena vijjāpaṭipakkhā avijjā. Paṭipakkhatā cassā pahātabbabhāvena vijjāya ca pahāyakabhāvenāti dasseti. ^b^Esa nayo itarasmimpi padadvaye^eb^ti iminā ‘‘tamo vihato vinaṭṭho. Kasmā? Yasmā āloko uppanno’’ti imamatthaṃ atidisati. Kilesānaṃ ātāpanaparitāpanaṭṭhena ^a^M3.0219^ea^ vīriyaṃ ^b^ātāpo^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘vīriyātāpena ātāpino’’^eb^ti, vīriyavatoti attho. ^b^Pesitattassā^eb^ti yathādhippetatthasiddhiṃ pati vissaṭṭhacittassa. ^b^Yathā appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharato^eb^ti aññassapi kassaci mādisassāti adhippāyo. ^b^Padhānānuyogassā^eb^ti sammappadhānamanuyuttassa.
[03]^b^Paccavekkhaṇañāṇapariggahita^eb^nti na paṭhamadutiyañāṇadvayādhigamaṃ viya kevalanti adhippāyo. ^b^Dassento^eb^ti nigamanavasena dassento. Sarūpato hi pubbe dassitamevāti.

[03]^b^Tikkhattuṃ jāto^eb^ti iminā pana idaṃ dasseti – ‘‘ahaṃ, brāhmaṇa, paṭhamavijjāya jātoyeva purejātassa sahajātassa vā abhāvato sabbesaṃ vuddho mahallako, kimaṅgaṃ pana tīhi vijjāhi tikkhattuṃ jāto’’ti. ^b^Pubbenivāsañāṇena atītaṃsañāṇa^eb^nti atītārammaṇasabhāgatāya tabbhāvibhāvato ca pubbenivāsañāṇena atītaṃsañāṇaṃ pakāsetvāti yojetabbaṃ. Tattha ^b^atītaṃsañāṇa^eb^nti atītakkhandhāyatanadhātusaṅkhāte atīte koṭṭhāse appaṭihatañāṇaṃ. Dibbacakkhuñāṇassa paccuppannārammaṇattā yathākammūpagañāṇassa anāgataṃsañāṇassa ca dibbacakkhuvaseneva ijjhanato dibbacakkhuno paribhaṇḍañāṇattā dibbacakkhumhiyeva ca ṭhitassa cetopariyañāṇasiddhito vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘dibbacakkhunā paccuppannānāgataṃsañāṇa’’^eb^nti. Tattha ^b^dibbacakkhunā^eb^ti saparibhaṇḍena dibbacakkhuñāṇena. Paccuppannaṃso ca anāgataṃso ca paccuppannānāgataṃsaṃ, tattha ñāṇaṃ ^b^paccuppannānāgataṃsañāṇaṃ^eb^. Āsavakkhayañāṇādhigameneva sabbaññutaññāṇassa viya sesāsādhāraṇachañāṇadasabalañāṇāaveṇikabuddhadhammādīnampi ^a^V3.0204^ea^ anaññasādhāraṇānaṃ buddhaguṇānaṃ ijjhanato vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘āsavakkhayena sakalalokiyalokuttaraguṇa’’^eb^nti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sabbepi sabbaññuguṇe pakāsetvā’’^eb^ti.
[03]^b^Pītivipphāraparipuṇṇagattacitto^eb^ti pītipharaṇena paripuṇṇakāyacitto. ^b^Aññāṇa^eb^nti aññāṇassāti attho. Dhi-saddayogato hi sāmiatthe etaṃ upayogavacanaṃ. Sesamettha suviññeyyameva.
[06]Verañjasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^12^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dutiye ^a^M3.0220^ea^^b^santhāgāraṃ^eb^ (ma. ni. aṭṭha. 1.22; saṃ. ni. aṭṭha. 3.4.243) nāma ekā mahāsālāva. Uyyogakālādīsu hi rājāno tattha ṭhatvā ‘‘ettakā purato gacchantu, ettakā pacchā’’tiādinā tattha nisīditvā santhaṃ karonti, mariyādaṃ bandhanti, tasmā taṃ ṭhānaṃ ‘‘santhāgāra’’nti vuccati. Uyyogaṭṭhānato ca āgantvā yāva gehe gomayaparibhaṇḍādivasena paṭijagganaṃ karonti, tāva ekaṃ dve divase te rājāno tattha santhambhantītipi ^b^santhāgāraṃ^eb^. Tesaṃ rājūnaṃ saha atthānusāsanaṃ agārantipi ^b^santhāgāraṃ^eb^. Gaṇarājāno hi te, tasmā uppannaṃ kiccaṃ ekassa vasena na sijjhati, sabbesaṃ chando laddhuṃ vaṭṭati, tasmā sabbe tattha sannipatitvā anusāsanti. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘saha atthānusāsanaṃ agāra’’^eb^nti. Yasmā vā tattha sannipatitvā ‘‘imasmiṃ kāle kasituṃ vaṭṭati, imasmiṃ kāle vapitu’’ntiādinā nayena gharāvāsakiccāni sammantayanti, tasmā chiddāvachiddaṃ gharāvāsaṃ santharantītipi ^b^santhāgāraṃ^eb^.

[03]Puttadāradhanādiupakaraṇapariccāgo ^b^pāramiyo^eb^. Attano aṅgapariccāgo ^b^upapāramiyo^eb^. Attanova jīvitapariccāgo ^b^paramatthapāramiyo^eb^. Ñātīnaṃ atthacariyā ^b^ñātatthacariyā^eb^. Lokassa atthacariyā ^b^lokatthacariyā^eb^. Kammassakatañāṇavasena anavajjakammāyatanasippāyatanavijjāṭṭhānaparicayavasena khandhāyatanādiparicayavasena lakkhaṇattayatīraṇavasena ca ñāṇacāro ^b^buddhacariyā^eb^. Aṅganayanadhanarajjaputtadāraparijjāgavasena ^b^pañca mahāpariccāge pariccajantena^eb^. Satipi mahāpariccāgānaṃ dānapāramibhāve pariccāgavisesasabhāvadassanatthañceva sudukkarabhāvadassanatthañca pañcamahāpariccāgānaṃ visuṃ gahaṇaṃ, tatoyeva ca aṅgapariccāgato visuṃ nayanapariccāgaggahaṇaṃ. Pariccāgabhāvasāmaññepi ^a^V3.0205^ea^ dhanarajjapariccāgato puttadārapariccāgaggahaṇañca visuṃ kataṃ. Pabbajjāva saṅkhepo.
[03]^b^Sattasu anupassanāsū^eb^ti aniccānupassanā, dukkhānupassanā, anattānupassanā, nibbidānupassanā, virāgānupassanā, nirodhānupassanā, paṭinissaggānupassanāti imāsu sattasu anupassanāsu.
[03]^b^Anuviccakāra^eb^nti ^a^M3.0221^ea^ aveccakaraṇaṃ. Dvīhi kāraṇehi aniyyānikasāsane ṭhitā attano sāvakattaṃ upagate paggaṇhanti, tāni dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘kasmā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Anupubbiṃ katha^eb^nti (dī. ni. ṭī. 2.75-76) anupubbaṃ kathetabbakathaṃ. Kā pana sāti? Dānādikathā. Tattha ^b^dānakathā^eb^ tāva pacurajanesupi pavattiyā sabbasattasādhāraṇattā sukarattā sīle patiṭṭhānassa upāyabhāvato ca ādito kathitā. Pariccāgasīlo hi puggalo pariggahavatthūsu nissaṅgabhāvato sukheneva sīlāni samādiyati, tattha ca suppatiṭṭhito hoti. Sīlena dāyakappaṭiggāhakavisuddhito parānuggahaṃ vatvā parapīḷānivattivacanato kiriyādhammaṃ vatvā akiriyādhammavacanato, bhogasampattihetuṃ vatvā bhavasampattihetuvacanato ca dānakathānantaraṃ ^b^sīlakathā^eb^ kathitā. ‘‘Tañca sīlaṃ vaṭṭanissitaṃ, ayaṃ bhavasampatti tassa phala’’nti dassanatthaṃ. ‘‘Imehi ca dānasīlamayehi paṇītapaṇītatarādibhedabhinnehi puññakiriyavatthūhi etā cātumahārājikādīsu paṇītapaṇītatarādibhedabhinnā aparimeyyā dibbabhogasampattiyo laddhabbā’’ti dassanatthaṃ tadanantaraṃ ^b^saggakathā^eb^. ‘‘Svāyaṃ saggo rāgādīhi upakkiliṭṭho, sabbathānupakkiliṭṭho ariyamaggo’’ti dassanatthaṃ saggānantaraṃ ^b^maggo,^eb^ maggañca kathentena tadadhigamūpāyasandassanatthaṃ saggapariyāpannāpi pageva itare sabbepi kāmā nāma bahvādīnavā aniccā addhuvā vipariṇāmadhammāti ^b^kāmānaṃ ādīnavo^eb^. ‘‘Hīnā gammā pothujjanikā anariyā anatthasaṃhitā’’ti tesaṃ ^b^okāro^eb^ lāmakabhāvo. Sabbepi bhavā kilesānaṃ vatthubhūtāti tattha ^b^saṃkileso^eb^. Sabbaso saṃkilesavippamuttaṃ nibbānanti ^b^nekkhamme ānisaṃso^eb^ ca kathetabboti ayamattho ^b^maggantī^eb^ti ettha ^b^iti^eb^-saddena ādi-atthena dīpitoti veditabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Sukhānaṃ nidāna^eb^nti diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ samparāyikānaṃ nibbānupasaṃhitānañcāti sabbesampi sukhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ. Yañhi kiñci loke bhogasukhaṃ nāma, taṃ sabbaṃ dānādhīnanti pākaṭoyamattho. Yaṃ pana jhānavipassanāmaggaphalanibbānappaṭisaṃyuttaṃ sukhaṃ, tassapi dānaṃ upanissayapaccayo hotiyeva ^a^V3.0206^ea^. ^b^Sampattīnaṃ mūla^eb^nti yā imā loke padesarajjasirissariyasattaratanasamujjalacakkavattisampadāti evaṃpabhedā mānusikā sampattiyo, yā ca cātumahārājikādigatā dibbasampattiyo, yā vā panaññāpi sampattiyo ^a^M3.0222^ea^, tāsaṃ sabbāsaṃ idaṃ mūlakāraṇaṃ. ^b^Bhogāna^eb^nti bhuñjitabbaṭṭhena ‘‘bhogo’’ti laddhanāmānaṃ piyamanāpiyarūpādīnaṃ tannissayānaṃ vā upabhogasukhānaṃ patiṭṭhā niccalādhiṭṭhānatāya. ^b^Visamagatassā^eb^ti byasanappattassa. ^b^Tāṇa^eb^nti rakkhā, tato paripālanato. ^b^Leṇa^eb^nti byasanehi paripātiyamānassa olīyanappadeso. ^b^Gatī^eb^ti gantabbaṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^Parāyaṇa^eb^nti paṭisaraṇaṃ. ^b^Avassayo^eb^ti vinipatituṃ adento nissayo. ^b^Ārammaṇa^eb^nti olubbhārammaṇaṃ.

[03]^b^Ratanamayasīhāsanasadisa^eb^nti sabbaratanamayasattaṅgamahāsīhāsanasadisaṃ. Evaṃ hissa mahagghaṃ hutvā sabbaso vinipatituṃ appadānaṭṭho dīpito hoti. ^b^Mahāpathavīsadisaṃ^eb^ gatagataṭṭhāne patiṭṭhānassa labhāpanato. Yathā dubbalassa purisassa ālambanarajju uttiṭṭhato tiṭṭhato ca upatthambho, evaṃ dānaṃ sattānaṃ sampattibhave upapattiyā ṭhitiyā ca paccayoti āha ^b^‘‘ālambanaṭṭhena ālambanarajjusadisa’’^eb^nti. ^b^Dukkhanittharaṇaṭṭhenā^eb^ti duggatidukkhaṭṭhānanittharaṇaṭṭhena. ^b^Samassāsanaṭṭhenā^eb^ti lobhamacchariyādipaṭisattupaddavato samassāsanaṭṭhena. ^b^Bhayaparittāṇaṭṭhenā^eb^ti dāliddiyabhayato paripālanaṭṭhena. ^b^Maccheramalādīhī^eb^ti maccheralobhadosamadaissāmicchādiṭṭhivicikicchādicittamalehi. ^b^Anupalittaṭṭhenā^eb^ti anupakkiliṭṭhatāya. ^b^Tesa^eb^nti maccheramalādīnaṃ. Tesaṃ eva ^b^durāsadaṭṭhena. Asantāsanaṭṭhenā^eb^ti santāsahetuabhāvena. Yo hi dāyako dānapati, so sampatipi na kutoci santasati, pageva āyatiṃ. ^b^Balavantaṭṭhenā^eb^ti mahābalavatāya. Dāyako hi dānapati sampati pakkhabalena balavā hoti, āyatiṃ pana kāyabalādīhipi. ^b^Abhimaṅgalasammataṭṭhenā^eb^ti ‘‘vaḍḍhikāraṇa’’nti abhisammatabhāvena. Vipattibhavato sampattibhavūpanayanaṃ ^b^khemantabhūmisampāpanaṃ^eb^.

[03]Idāni mahābodhicariyabhāvenapi dānaguṇaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘dānaṃ nāmeta’’^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^attānaṃ niyyātentenā^eb^ti etena ‘‘dānaphalaṃ sammadeva passantā mahāpurisā attano jīvitampi pariccajanti, tasmā ko nāma viññujātiko bāhire vatthusmiṃ pageva saṅgaṃ kareyyā’’ti ovādaṃ deti. Idāni yā lokiyā lokuttarā ca ukkaṃsagatā sampattiyo, tā sabbā dānatoyeva pavattantīti dassento ^b^‘‘dānañhī’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha ^a^M3.0223^ea^ sakkamārabrahmasampattiyo attahitāya eva, cakkavattisampatti pana attahitāya parahitāya cāti dassetuṃ sā tāsaṃ parato cakkavattisampatti vuttā. Etā lokiyā, imā pana lokuttarāti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘sāvakapāramiñāṇa’’^eb^ntiādi ^a^V3.0207^ea^ vuttaṃ. Tāsupi ukkaṭṭhukkaṭṭhatarukkaṭṭhatamataṃ dassetuṃ kamena ñāṇattayaṃ vuttaṃ. Tesaṃ pana dānassa paccayabhāvo heṭṭhā vuttoyeva. Eteneva tassa brahmasampattiyāpi paccayabhāvo dīpitoti veditabbo.

[03]Dānañca nāma dakkhiṇeyyesu hitajjhāsayena pūjanajjhāsayena vā attano santakassa paresaṃ pariccajanaṃ, tasmā dāyako purisapuggalo pare hanti, paresaṃ vā santakaṃ haratīti aṭṭhānametanti āha ^b^‘‘dānaṃ dento sīlaṃ samādātuṃ sakkotī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sīlālaṅkārasadiso alaṅkāro natthi^eb^ sobhāvisesāvahattā sīlassa. ^b^Sīlapupphasadisaṃ pupphaṃ natthī^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. ^b^Sīlagandhasadiso gandho natthī^eb^ti ettha ‘‘candanaṃ tagaraṃ vāpī’’tiādikā (dha. pa. 55) gāthā – ‘‘gandho isīnaṃ ciradikkhitānaṃ, kāyā cuto gacchati mālutenā’’tiādikā (jā. 2.17.55) jātakagāthāyo ca āharitvā vattabbā. Sīlañhi sattānaṃ ābharaṇañceva alaṅkāro ca gandhavilepanañca parassa dassanīyabhāvāvahañca. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sīlālaṅkārena hī’’^eb^tiādi.
[03]^b^Ayaṃ saggo labbhatī^eb^ti idaṃ majjhimehi āraddhaṃ sīlaṃ sandhāyāha. Tenevāha sakko devarājā –
[21]‘‘Hīnena brahmacariyena, khattiye upapajjati;
[22]Majjhimena ca devattaṃ, uttamena visujjhatī’’ti. (jā. 1.8.75);
[03]^b^Iṭṭho^eb^ti sukho. ^b^Kantoti^eb^ kamanīyo. ^b^Manāpo^eb^ti manavaḍḍhanako. Taṃ pana tassa iṭṭhādibhāvaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘niccamettha kīḷā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Doso^eb^ti aniccatādinā appassādādinā ca dūsitabhāvo, yato te viññūnaṃ cittaṃ nārādhenti. Atha vā ādīnaṃ vāti pavattatīti ^b^ādīnavo,^eb^ paramakapaṇatā. Tathā ca kāmā yathātathaṃ paccavekkhantānaṃ paccupatiṭṭhanti. ^b^Lāmakabhāvo^eb^ti aseṭṭhehi sevitabbo, seṭṭhehi na sevitabbo nihīnabhāvo. ^b^Saṃkilissana^eb^nti vibādhakatā upatāpakatā ca.

[03]^b^Nekkhamme^eb^^a^M3.0224^ea^^b^ānisaṃsa^eb^nti ettha ‘‘yattakā kāmesu ādīnavā, tappaṭipakkhato tattakā nekkhamme ānisaṃsā. Apica nekkhammaṃ nāmetaṃ asambādhaṃ asaṃkiliṭṭhaṃ, nikkhantaṃ kāmehi, nikkhantaṃ ^a^V3.0208^ea^ kāmasaññāya, nikkhantaṃ kāmavitakkehi, nikkhantaṃ kāmapariḷāhehi, nikkhantaṃ byāpādasaññāyā’’tiādinā nayena nekkhamme ānisaṃse pakāsesi. Pabbajjāyaṃ jhānādīsu ca guṇe vibhāvesi vaṇṇesi. ^b^Kallacitta^eb^nti kammaniyacittaṃ heṭṭhā pavattitadesanāya assaddhiyādīnaṃ cittadosānaṃ vigatattā upari desanāya bhājanabhāvūpagamena kammakkhamacittaṃ. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana yasmā assaddhiyādayo cittassa rogabhūtā, tadā te vigatā, tasmā āha ^b^‘‘arogacitta’’^eb^nti. Diṭṭhimānādikilesavigamena ^b^muducittaṃ^eb^. Kāmacchandādivigamena ^b^vinīvaraṇacittaṃ^eb^. Sammāpaṭipattiyaṃ uḷārapītipāmojjayogena ^b^udaggacittaṃ^eb^. Tattha saddhāsampattiyā ^b^pasannacittaṃ^eb^. Yadā bhagavā aññāsīti sambandho. Atha vā ^b^kallacitta^eb^nti kāmacchandavigamena arogacittaṃ. ^b^Muducitta^eb^nti byāpādavigamena mettāvasena akaṭhinacittaṃ. ^b^Vinīvaraṇacitta^eb^nti uddhaccakukkuccavigamena avikkhepato tena apihitacittaṃ. ^b^Udaggacitta^eb^nti thinamiddhavigamena sampaggahitavasena alīnacittaṃ. ^b^Pasannacitta^eb^nti vicikicchāvigamena sammāpaṭipattiyaṃ adhimuttacittanti evamettha sesapadānaṃ attho veditabbo.

[03]^b^Seyyathāpī^eb^tiādinā upamāvasena sīhassa kilesappahānaṃ ariyamagguppādanañca dasseti. ^b^Apagatakāḷaka^eb^nti vigatakāḷakaṃ. ^b^Sammadevā^eb^ti suṭṭhudeva. ^b^Rajana^eb^nti nīlapītalohitādiraṅgajātaṃ. ^b^Paṭiggaṇheyyā^eb^ti gaṇheyya, pabhassaraṃ bhaveyya. ^b^Tasmiṃyeva āsane^eb^ti tassaṃyeva nisajjāyaṃ. Etenassa lahuvipassakatā tikkhapaññatā sukhappaṭipadakhippābhiññatā ca dassitā hoti. ^b^Viraja^eb^nti apāyagamanīyarāgarajādīnaṃ vigamena virajaṃ. Anavasesadiṭṭhivicikicchāmalāpagamena ^b^vītamalaṃ^eb^. Paṭhamamaggavajjhakilesarajābhāvena vā ^b^virajaṃ^eb^. Pañcavidhadussīlyamalavigamena ^b^vītamalaṃ. Tassa uppattiākāradassanattha^eb^nti kasmā vuttaṃ? Nanu maggañāṇaṃ asaṅkhatadhammārammaṇanti codanaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘tañhī’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha ^b^paṭivijjhanta^eb^nti asammohappaṭivedhavasena paṭivijjhantaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘kiccavasenā’’^eb^ti. Tatridaṃ upamāsaṃsandanaṃ – vatthaṃ viya cittaṃ, vatthassa āgantukamalehi kiliṭṭhabhāvo viya cittassa rāgādimalehi saṃkiliṭṭhabhāvo, dhovanasilātalaṃ viya anupubbīkathā, udakaṃ viya saddhā, udakena ^a^M3.0225^ea^ temetvā ūsagomayachārikakhārehi kāḷake sammadditvā vatthassa dhovanappayogo viya saddhāsinehena temetvā temetvā satisamādhipaññāhi dose sithile katvā sutādividhinā cittassa sodhane vīriyārambho. Tena payogena vatthe kāḷakāpagamo viya vīriyārambhena kilesavikkhambhanaṃ, raṅgajātaṃ viya ariyamaggo, tena suddhavatthassa pabhassarabhāvo viya vikkhambhitakilesassa cittassa maggena pariyodapananti.

[03]‘‘Diṭṭhadhammo’’ti vatvā dassanaṃ nāma ñāṇadassanato aññampi atthīti tannivattanatthaṃ ^b^‘‘pattadhammo’’^eb^ti ^a^V3.0209^ea^ vuttaṃ. Patti nāma ñāṇasampattito aññāpi vijjatīti tato visesanatthaṃ ^b^‘‘viditadhammo’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Sā panesā viditadhammatā dhammesu ekadesenapi hotīti nippadesato viditabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ. ^b^‘‘Pariyogāḷhadhammo’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Tenassa saccābhisambodhaṃyeva dīpeti. Maggañāṇañhi ekābhisamayavasena pariññādikiccaṃ sādhentaṃ nippadesena catusaccadhammaṃ samantato ogāḷhaṃ nāma hoti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘diṭṭho ariyasaccadhammo etenāti diṭṭhadhammo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Tiṇṇā vicikicchā^eb^ti sappaṭibhayakantārasadisā soḷasavatthukā aṭṭhavatthukā ca tiṇṇā nittiṇṇā vicikicchā. ^b^Vigatā kathaṃkathā^eb^ti pavattiādīsu ‘‘evaṃ nu kho, na nu kho’’ti evaṃ pavattikā vigatā samucchinnā kathaṃkathā. Sārajjakarānaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ pahīnattā tappaṭipakkhesu sīlādiguṇesu patiṭṭhitattā ^b^vesārajjaṃ^eb^ visāradabhāvaṃ veyyattiyaṃ ^b^patto^eb^. Attanā eva paccakkhato diṭṭhattā na paraṃ pacceti, na cassa paro paccetabbo atthīti ^b^aparappaccayo^eb^.

[03]^b^Uddisitvā kata^eb^nti attānaṃ uddisitvā māraṇavasena kataṃ nibbattitaṃ maṃsaṃ. ^b^Paṭiccakamma^eb^nti ettha kamma-saddo kammasādhano atītakāliko cāti āha ^b^‘‘attānaṃ paṭiccakata’’^eb^nti. ^b^Nimittakammassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ^eb^ ‘‘paṭicca kammaṃ phusatī’’tiādīsu (jā. 1.4.75) viya. ^b^Nimittakammassā^eb^ti nimittabhāvena laddhabbakammassa. Karaṇavasena paṭiccakammaṃ ettha atthīti maṃsaṃ ^b^paṭiccakammaṃ^eb^ yathā buddhi buddhaṃ. Taṃ etassa atthīti buddho. Sesamettha uttānameva.
[06]Sīhasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^13-14^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tatiye ^a^M3.0226^ea^^b^sāṭheyyānī^eb^ti saṭhattāni. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo. Tāni panassa sāṭheyyādīni kāyacittujukatāpaṭipakkhabhūtā lobhasahagatacittuppādassa pavattiākāravisesā. Tattha yassa kismiñcideva ṭhāne ṭhātukāmassa sato yaṃ ṭhānaṃ manussānaṃ sappaṭibhayaṃ, purato gantvā tatheva sappaṭibhayaṭṭhāneva ṭhassāmīti na hoti, vañcanādhippāyabhāvato ṭhātukāmaṭṭhāneyeva nikhātatthambho viya cattāro pāde niccāletvā tiṭṭhati, ayaṃ ^b^saṭho^eb^ nāma, imassa sāṭheyyassa pākaṭakaraṇaṃ. Tathā yassa kismiñcideva ṭhāne nivattitvā khandhagataṃ pātetukāmassa sato yaṃ ṭhānaṃ manussānaṃ sappaṭibhayaṃ, purato gantvā tatheva pātessāmīti na hoti, pātetukāmaṭṭhāneyeva nivattitvā pāteti, ayaṃ ^b^kūṭo^eb^ nāma. Yassa kālena vāmato, kālena dakkhiṇato, kālena ujumaggeneva ca gantukāmassa sato yaṃ ṭhānaṃ manussānaṃ sappaṭibhayaṃ, purato gantvā tatheva evaṃ karissāmīti ^a^V3.0210^ea^ na hoti, yadicchakaṃ gantukāmaṭṭhāneyeva kālena vāmato, kālena dakkhiṇato, kālena ujumaggaṃ gacchati, tathā leṇḍaṃ vā passāvaṃ vā vissajjetukāmassa idaṃ ṭhānaṃ susammaṭṭhaṃ ākiṇṇamanussaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ. Imasmiṃ ṭhāne evarūpaṃ kātuṃ na yuttaṃ, purato gantvā paṭicchannaṭṭhāne karissāmīti na hoti, tattheva karoti, ayaṃ ^b^jimho^eb^ nāma. Yassa pana kismiñci ṭhāne maggā ukkamma nivattitvā paṭimaggaṃ ārohitukāmassa sato yaṃ ṭhānaṃ manussānaṃ sappaṭibhayaṃ, purato gantvā tattheva evaṃ karissāmīti na hoti, paṭimaggaṃ ārohitukāmaṭṭhāneyeva maggā ukkamma nivattitvā paṭimaggaṃ ārohati, ayaṃ ^b^vaṅko^eb^ nāma. Iti imaṃ catubbidhampi kiriyaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘yāni kho panassa tāni sāṭheyyāni…pe… āvikattā hotī’’^eb^ti. Catutthe natthi vattabbaṃ.
[06]Assājānīyasuttādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^15-18^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pañcame (dha. pa. aṭṭha. 2.241) yā kāci pariyatti vā sippaṃ vā yasmā asajjhāyantassa ananuyuñjantassa vinassati, nirantaraṃ vā na upaṭṭhāti, tasmā ^b^‘‘asajjhāyamalā mantā’’^eb^ti ^a^M3.0227^ea^ vuttaṃ. Yasmā pana gharāvāsaṃ vasantassa uṭṭhāyuṭṭhāya jiṇṇappaṭisaṅkharaṇādīni akarontassa gharaṃ nāma vinassati, tasmā ^b^‘‘anuṭṭhānamalā gharā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Yasmā gihissa vā pabbajitassa vā kosajjavasena sarīrappajagganaṃ vā parikkhārappaṭijagganaṃ vā akarontassa kāyo dubbaṇṇo hoti, tasmā ^b^‘‘malaṃ vaṇṇassa kosajja’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. Yasmā pana gāvo rakkhantassa pamādavasena niddāyantassa vā kīḷantassa vā tā gāvo atitthapakkhandanādīhi vā vāḷamigacorādiupaddavena vā paresaṃ sālikkhettādīni otaritvā khādanavasena vā vināsamāpajjanti, sayampi daṇḍaṃ vā paribhāsaṃ vā pāpuṇāti, pabbajitaṃ vā pana chadvārādīni arakkhantaṃ pamādavasena kilesā otaritvā sāsanā cāventi, tasmā ^b^‘‘pamādo rakkhato mala’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. So hissa vināsāvahena malaṭṭhāniyattā ^b^malaṃ^eb^.

[03]^b^Duccarita^eb^nti aticāro. Aticāriniñhi itthiṃ sāmikopi gehā nīharati, mātāpitūnaṃ santikaṃ gatampi ‘‘tvaṃ kulassa aṅgārabhūtā, akkhīhipi na daṭṭhabbā’’ti taṃ mātāpitaropi nīharanti, sā anāthā vicarantī mahādukkhaṃ pāpuṇāti. Tenassā duccaritaṃ ^b^‘‘mala’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ^b^Dadato^eb^ti dāyakassa. Yassa hi khettakasanakāle ‘‘imasmiṃ khette sampanne salākabhattādīni dassāmī’’ti ^a^V3.0211^ea^ cintetvāpi nipphanne sasse maccheraṃ uppajjitvā cāgacittaṃ nivāreti, so maccheravasena cāgacitte aviruhante manussasampatti, dibbasampatti, nibbānasampattīti tisso sampattiyo na labhati. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘maccheraṃ dadato mala’’^eb^nti. Aññesupi evarūpesu eseva nayo. ^b^Pāpakā dhammā^eb^ti akusalā dhammā. Te pana idhaloke paraloke ca malameva. ^b^Tato^eb^ti heṭṭhā vuttamalato. ^b^Malatara^eb^nti atirekamalaṃ. Chaṭṭhādīni uttānatthāneva.
[06]Malasuttādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^19^eb^^b^.^eb^ Navame (udā. aṭṭha. 45; sārattha. ṭī. cūḷavagga 3.384) ^b^asurā^eb^ti devā viya na suranti na kīḷanti na virocantīti asurā. Surā nāma devā, tesaṃ paṭipakkhāti vā ^b^asurā,^eb^ vepacittipahārādādayo ^a^M3.0228^ea^. Tesaṃ bhavanaṃ sinerussa heṭṭhābhāge. Te tattha pavisantā nikkhamantā sinerupāde maṇḍapādīni nimminitvā kīḷantā abhiramanti. Sā tattha tesaṃ abhirati. Ime guṇe disvāti āha ^b^‘‘ye disvā disvā asurā mahāsamudde abhiramantī’’^eb^ti.

[03]Yasmā lokiyā jambudīpo, himavā tattha patiṭṭhitasamuddadahapabbatā tappabhavā nadiyoti etesu yaṃ yaṃ na manussagocaraṃ, tattha sayaṃ sammūḷhā aññepi sammohayanti, tasmā tattha sammohavidhamanatthaṃ ^b^‘‘ayaṃ tāva jambudīpo’’^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. Dasasahassayojanaparimāṇo āyāmato vitthārato cāti adhippāyo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tatthā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Udakena ajjhotthaṭo^eb^ tadupabhogisattānaṃ puññakkhayena. Sundaradassanaṃ kūṭanti ^b^sudassanakūṭaṃ,^eb^ yaṃ loke ^b^‘‘hemakūṭa’’^eb^nti vuccati. ^b^Mūlagandho^eb^ kālānusāriyādi. ^b^Sāragandho^eb^ candanādi. ^b^Pheggugandho^eb^ salalādi. ^b^Tacagandho^eb^ lavaṅgādi. ^b^Papaṭikāgandho^eb^ kapitthādi. ^b^Rasagandho^eb^ sajjulasādi. ^b^Pattagandho^eb^ tamālahiriverādi. ^b^Pupphagandho^eb^ nāgakusumādi. ^b^Phalagandho^eb^ jātiphalādi. ^b^Gandhagandho^eb^ sabbesaṃ gandhānaṃ gandho. ‘‘Sabbāni puthulato paññāsa yojanāni, āyāmato pana ubbedhato viya dviyojanasatānevā’’ti vadanti.

[03]^b^Manoharasilātalānī^eb^ti ratanamayattā manuññasopānasilātalāni. ^b^Supaṭiyattānī^eb^ti tadupabhogisattānaṃ sādhāraṇakammunāva suṭṭhu paṭiyattāni susaṇṭhitāni honti. Macchakacchapādīni udakaṃ malaṃ karonti, tadabhāvato ^b^phalikasadisanimmalodakāni^eb^. Tiriyato dīghaṃ uggatakūṭanti ^b^‘‘tiracchānapabbata’’^eb^nti ^a^V3.0212^ea^ āha. ^b^Purimāni nāmagottānī^eb^ti ettha nadī ninnagātiādikaṃ gottaṃ, gaṅgā yamunātiādikaṃ nāmaṃ.

[03]^b^Savamānā^eb^ti sandamānā. ^b^Pūratta^eb^nti puṇṇabhāvo. ^b^Masāragallaṃ^eb^ ‘‘cittaphalika’’ntipi vadanti. ^b^Mahataṃ bhūtāna^eb^nti mahantānaṃ sattānaṃ. ^b^Timī timiṅgalā timitimiṅgalā^eb^ti tisso macchajātiyo. Timiṃ gilanasamatthā timiṅgalā. Timiñca timiṅgalañca gilanasamatthā timitimiṅgalāti vadanti.

[03]^b^Mama^eb^^a^M3.0229^ea^^b^sāvakā^eb^ti sotāpannādike ariyapuggale sandhāya vadati. ^b^Na saṃvasatī^eb^ti uposathakammādivasena saṃvāsaṃ na karoti. ^b^Ukkhipatī^eb^ti apaneti. ^b^Vimuttiraso^eb^ti kilesehi vimuccanaraso. Sabbā hi sāsanasampatti yāvadeva anupādāya āsavehi cittassa vimuttiatthā.
[03]^b^Ratanānī^eb^ti ratijananaṭṭhena ratanāni. Satipaṭṭhānādayo hi bhāviyamānā pubbabhāgepi anappakaṃ pītipāmojjaṃ nibbattenti, pageva aparabhāge. Vuttañhetaṃ –
[21]‘‘Yato yato sammasati, khandhānaṃ udayabbayaṃ;
[22]Labhatī pītipāmojjaṃ, amataṃ taṃ vijānata’’nti. (dha. pa. 374) –
[07]Lokiyaratananibbattaṃ pana pītipāmojjaṃ na tassa kalabhāgampi agghati. Apica –
[21]‘‘Cittīkataṃ mahagghañca, atulaṃ dullabhadassanaṃ;
[22]Anomasattaparibhogaṃ, ratananti pavuccati’’. (dī. ni. aṭṭha. 2.33; saṃ. ni. aṭṭha. 3.5.223; khu. pā. aṭṭha. 6.3; su. ni. aṭṭha. 1.226; mahāni. aṭṭha. 50);

[03]Yadi ca cittīkatādibhāvena ratanaṃ nāma hoti, satipaṭṭhānādīnaṃyeva bhūtato ratanabhāvo. Bodhipakkhiyadhammānañhi so ānubhāvo, yaṃ sāvakā sāvakapāramiñāṇaṃ, paccekabuddhā paccekabodhiñāṇaṃ, sammāsambuddhā sammāsambodhiṃ adhigacchanti āsannakāraṇattā. Āsannakāraṇañhi dānādiupanissayoti evaṃ ratijananaṭṭhena cittīkatādiatthena ca ratanabhāvo bodhipakkhiyadhammānaṃ ^a^V3.0213^ea^ sātisayo. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘tatrimāni ratanāni, seyyathidaṃ. Cattāro satipaṭṭhānā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]Tattha ārammaṇe okkantitvā upaṭṭhānaṭṭhena upaṭṭhānaṃ, satiyeva upaṭṭhānanti ^b^satipaṭṭhānaṃ^eb^. Ārammaṇassa pana kāyādivasena catubbidhattā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘cattāro satipaṭṭhānā’’^eb^ti. Tathā hi kāyavedanācittadhammesu subhasukhaniccāttasaññānaṃ pahānato asubhadukkhāniccānattabhāvaggahaṇato ca nesaṃ kāyānupassanādibhāvo vibhatto.

[03]Sammā padahanti etena, sayaṃ vā sammā padahati, pasatthaṃ sundaraṃ vā padahantīti ^b^sammappadhānaṃ,^eb^ puggalassa vā sammadeva padhānabhāvakaraṇato ^b^sammappadhānaṃ^eb^^a^M3.0230^ea^ vīriyassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tampi anuppannuppannānaṃ akusalānaṃ anuppādanappahānavasena anuppannuppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ uppādanaṭṭhāpanavasena ca catukiccasādhakattā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘cattāro sammappadhānā’’^eb^ti.

[03]Ijjhatīti iddhi, samijjhati nipphajjatīti attho. Ijjhanti vā tāya sattā iddhā vuddhā ukkaṃsagatā hontīti iddhi. Iti paṭhamena atthena iddhi eva pādoti ^b^iddhipādo,^eb^ iddhikoṭṭhāsoti attho. Dutiyena atthena iddhiyā pādo patiṭṭhā adhigamupāyoti ^b^iddhipādo^eb^. Tena hi uparūparivisesasaṅkhātaṃ iddhiṃ pajjanti pāpuṇanti. Svāyaṃ iddhipādo yasmā chandādike cattāro adhipatidhamme dhure jeṭṭhake katvā nibbattīyati, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘cattāro iddhipādā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Pañcindriyānī^eb^ti saddhādīni pañca indriyāni. Tattha assaddhiyaṃ abhibhavitvā adhimokkhalakkhaṇe indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti ^b^saddhindriyaṃ^eb^. Kosajjaṃ abhibhavitvā paggahalakkhaṇe, pamādaṃ abhibhavitvā upaṭṭhānalakkhaṇe, vikkhepaṃ abhibhavitvā avikkhepalakkhaṇe, aññāṇaṃ abhibhavitvā dassanalakkhaṇe indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti ^b^paññindriyaṃ^eb^.
[03]Tāniyeva assaddhiyādīhi anabhibhavanīyato akampiyaṭṭhena sampayuttadhammesu thirabhāvena ca ^b^balāni^eb^ veditabbāni.

[03]^b^Satta bojjhaṅgā^eb^ti bodhiyā, bodhissa vā aṅgāti ^b^bojjhaṅgā^eb^. Yā hi esā dhammasāmaggī yāya lokuttaramaggakkhaṇe uppajjamānāya līnuddhaccapatiṭṭhānāyūhanakāmasukhattakilamathānuyogaucchedasassatābhinivesādīnaṃ anekesaṃ upaddavānaṃ paṭipakkhabhūtāya satidhammavicayavīriyapītipassaddhisamādhiupekkhāsaṅkhātāya ^a^V3.0214^ea^ dhammasāmaggiyā ariyasāvako bujjhati, kilesaniddāya vuṭṭhahati, cattāri ariyasaccāni paṭivijjhati, nibbānameva vā sacchikarotīti ^b^‘‘bodhī’’^eb^ti vuccati. Tassā dhammasāmaggisaṅkhātāya bodhiyā aṅgātipi ^b^bojjhaṅgā^eb^ jhānaṅgamaggaṅgādayo viya. Yopesa vuttappakārāya dhammasāmaggiyā bujjhatīti katvā ariyasāvako ^b^‘‘bodhī’’^eb^ti vuccati. Tassa bodhissa aṅgātipi ^b^bojjhaṅgā^eb^ senaṅgarathaṅgādayo viya. Tenāhu porāṇā ‘‘bujjhanakassa puggalassa aṅgāti bojjhaṅgā’’ti (vibha. aṭṭha. 466; saṃ. ni. aṭṭha. 3.5.182; paṭi. ma. aṭṭha. 2.2.17). ‘‘Bodhāya saṃvattantīti bojjhaṅgā’’tiādinā (paṭi. ma. 2.17) nayenapi bojjhaṅgattho veditabbo.

[03]^b^Ariyo^eb^^a^M3.0231^ea^^b^aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo^eb^ti taṃtaṃmaggavajjhehi kilesehi ārakattā, ariyabhāvakarattā, ariyaphalappaṭilābhakarattā ca ariyo. Sammādiṭṭhiādīni aṭṭhaṅgāni assa atthi, aṭṭha aṅgāniyeva vā aṭṭhaṅgiko. Mārento kilese gacchati nibbānatthikehi vā maggīyati, sayaṃ vā nibbānaṃ maggatīti maggoti evametesaṃ satipaṭṭhānādīnaṃ atthavibhāgo veditabbo.

[03]^b^Sotāpanno^eb^ti maggasaṅkhātaṃ sotaṃ āpajjitvā pāpuṇitvā ṭhito, sotāpattiphalaṭṭhoti attho. ^b^Sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno^eb^ti sotāpattiphalassa attapaccakkhakaraṇāya paṭipajjamāno paṭhamamaggaṭṭho, yo aṭṭhamakotipi vuccati. ^b^Sakadāgāmī^eb^ti sakideva imaṃ lokaṃ paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena āgamanasīlo dutiyaphalaṭṭho. ^b^Anāgāmī^eb^ti paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena kāmalokaṃ anāgamanasīlo tatiyaphalaṭṭho. Yo pana saddhānusārī dhammānusārī ekabījītievamādiko ariyapuggalavibhāgo, so etesaṃyeva pabhedoti. Sesaṃ vuttanayasadisameva.
[06]Pahārādasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^20^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dasame ^b^tadahuposathe^eb^ti (udā. aṭṭha. 45; sārattha. ṭī. cūḷavagga 3.383) tasmiṃ uposathadivasabhūte ahani. ^b^Uposathakaraṇatthāyā^eb^ti ovādapātimokkhaṃ uddisituṃ. ^b^Uddhastaṃ aruṇa^eb^nti aruṇuggamanaṃ. ^b^Uddisatu, bhante, bhagavā bhikkhūnaṃ pātimokkha^eb^nti thero bhagavantaṃ pātimokkhuddesaṃ yāci. Tasmiṃ kāle ‘‘na, bhikkhave, anuposathe uposatho kātabbo’’ti (mahāva. 136) sikkhāpadassa apaññattattā. Kasmā pana bhagavā tiyāmarattiṃ vītināmesi ^a^V3.0215^ea^? Tato paṭṭhāya ovādapātimokkhaṃ anuddisitukāmo tassa vatthuṃ pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ. ^b^Addasā^eb^ti kathaṃ addasa? Attano cetopariyañāṇena tassaṃ parisati bhikkhūnaṃ cittāni parijānanto tassa dussīlassa cittaṃ passi. Yasmā pana citte diṭṭhe taṃsamaṅgīpuggalo diṭṭho nāma hoti, tasmā ^b^‘‘addasā kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno^eb^^a^M3.0232^ea^^b^taṃ puggalaṃ dussīla’’^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. Yatheva hi anāgate sattasu divasesu pavattaṃ paresaṃ cittaṃ cetopariyañāṇalābhī jānāti, evaṃ atītepīti. ^b^Majjhe bhikkhusaṅghassa nisinna^eb^nti saṅghapariyāpanno viya bhikkhusaṅghassa anto nisinnaṃ. ^b^Diṭṭhosī^eb^ti ayaṃ na pakatattoti bhagavatā diṭṭho asi. Yasmā ca evaṃ diṭṭho, tasmā natthi te tava bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ ekakammādisaṃvāso. Yasmā pana so saṃvāso tava natthi, tasmā uṭṭhehi, āvusoti evamettha padayojanā veditabbā.

[03]^b^Tatiyampi kho so puggalo tuṇhī ahosī^eb^ti anekavāraṃ vatvāpi ‘‘thero sayameva nibbinno oramissatī’’ti vā, ‘‘idāni imesaṃ paṭipattiṃ jānissāmī’’ti vā adhippāyena tuṇhī ahosi. ^b^Bāhāyaṃ gahetvā^eb^ti ‘‘bhagavatā mayā ca yāthāvato diṭṭho, yāvatatiyaṃ ‘uṭṭhehi, āvuso’ti ca vutto na vuṭṭhāti, idānissa nikkaḍḍhanakālo, mā saṅghassa uposathantarāyo ahosī’’ti taṃ bāhāyaṃ aggahesi, tathā gahetvā. ^b^Bahi dvārakoṭṭhakā nikkhāmetvā^eb^ti dvārakoṭṭhakā dvārasālāto nikkhāmetvā. ^b^Bahī^eb^ti pana nikkhāmitaṭṭhānadassanaṃ. Atha vā ^b^bahidvārakoṭṭhakā^eb^ti bahidvārakoṭṭhakatopi nikkhāmetvā, na antodvārakoṭṭhakato eva. Ubhayatthāpi vihārato bahikatvāti attho. ^b^Sūcighaṭikaṃ datvā^eb^ti aggaḷasūciñca uparighaṭikañca ādahitvā, suṭṭhutaraṃ kavāṭaṃ thaketvāti attho. ^b^Yāva bāhāgahaṇāpi nāmā^eb^ti iminā ‘‘aparisuddhā, ānanda, parisā’’ti vacanaṃ sutvā eva hi tena pakkamitabbaṃ siyā, evaṃ apakkamitvā yāva bāhāgahaṇāpi nāma so moghapuriso āgamessati, acchariyamidanti dasseti. Idañca garahanacchariyamevāti veditabbaṃ.

[03]Atha bhagavā cintesi – ‘‘idāni bhikkhusaṅghe abbudo jāto, aparisuddhā puggalā uposathaṃ āgacchanti, na ca tathāgatā aparisuddhāya parisāya uposathaṃ karonti, pātimokkhaṃ uddisanti. Anuddisante ca bhikkhusaṅghassa uposatho pacchijjati. Yaṃnūnāhaṃ ito paṭṭhāya bhikkhūnaṃyeva pātimokkhuddesaṃ anujāneyya’’nti. Evaṃ pana cintetvā bhikkhūnaṃyeva pātimokkhuddesaṃ anujāni. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘atha kho bhagavā…pe… pātimokkhaṃ uddiseyyāthā’’^eb^ti. Tattha ^b^na dānāha^eb^nti idāni ahaṃ uposathaṃ na ^a^M3.0233^ea^ karissāmi, pātimokkhaṃ na uddisissāmīti paccekaṃ ^b^na^eb^-kārena sambandho. Duvidhañhi pātimokkhaṃ – āṇāpātimokkhaṃ, ovādapātimokkhanti ^a^V3.0216^ea^. Tesu ‘‘suṇātu me, bhante’’tiādikaṃ (mahāva. 134) āṇāpātimokkhaṃ. Taṃ sāvakāva uddisanti, na buddhā, yaṃ anvaddhamāsaṃ uddisīyati. ‘‘Khantī paramaṃ…pe… sabbapāpassa akaraṇaṃ…pe… anupavādo anupaghāto…pe… etaṃ buddhāna sāsana’’nti (dī. ni. 2.90; dha. pa. 183-185; udā. 36; netti. 30) imā pana tisso gāthā ovādapātimokkhaṃ nāma. Taṃ buddhāva uddisanti, na sāvakā, channampi vassānaṃ accayena uddisanti. Dīghāyukabuddhānañhi dharamānakāle ayameva pātimokkhuddeso, appāyukabuddhānaṃ pana paṭhamabodhiyaṃyeva. Tato paraṃ itaro. Tañca kho bhikkhūyeva uddisanti, na buddhā, tasmā amhākampi bhagavā vīsativassamattaṃ imaṃ ovādapātimokkhaṃ uddisitvā imaṃ antarāyaṃ disvā tato paraṃ na uddisi. ^b^Aṭṭhāna^eb^nti akāraṇaṃ. ^b^Anavakāso^eb^ti tasseva vevacanaṃ. Kāraṇañhi yathā tiṭṭhati ettha phalaṃ tadāyattavuttitāyāti ‘‘ṭhāna’’nti vuccati, evaṃ ‘‘avakāso’’tipi vuccati. ^b^Ya^eb^nti kiriyāparāmasanaṃ.

[03]^b^Aṭṭhime, bhikkhave, mahāsamudde^eb^ti ko anusandhi? Yvāyaṃ aparisuddhāya parisāya pātimokkhassa anuddeso vutto, so imasmiṃ dhammavinaye acchariyo abbhuto dhammoti taṃ aparehipi sattahi acchariyabbhutadhammehi saddhiṃ vibhajitvā dassetukāmo paṭhamaṃ tāva tesaṃ upamābhāvena mahāsamudde aṭṭha acchariyabbhutadhamme dassento satthā ‘‘aṭṭhime, bhikkhave, mahāsamudde’’tiādimāha.
[06]Uposathasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Mahāvaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^21-27^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tatiyassa paṭhamadutiyesu natthi vattabbaṃ. Tatiye ‘‘hatthago’’ti vattabbe ^b^‘‘hatthako’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. So hi rājapurisānaṃ hatthato ^a^M3.0234^ea^ yakkhassa hatthaṃ, yakkhassa hatthato bhagavato hatthaṃ ^a^V3.0217^ea^, bhagavato hatthato puna rājapurisānaṃ hatthaṃ gatattā nāmato ^b^hatthako āḷavako^eb^ti jāto. Tenāha ^b^‘‘āḷavakayakkhassa hatthato hatthehi sampaṭicchitattā hatthakoti laddhanāmo rājakumāro’’^eb^ti. Catutthādīni uttānatthāneva.
[06]Paṭhamauggasuttādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^28^eb^^b^.^eb^ Aṭṭhame khīṇāsavassa sabbesaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ aniccatā asammohavasena kiccato maggapaññāya suppaṭividdhā, vipassanāya ārammaṇakaraṇavasenapīti dassento āha ^b^‘‘sahavipassanāya maggapaññāyā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ime kāmā^eb^ti dvepi kāme vadati. Kilesavasena uppajjamāno hi pariḷāho vatthukāmasannissayo vatthukāmavisayo vāti dvepi sapariḷāhaṭṭhena aṅgārakāsu viyāti ^b^‘‘aṅgārakāsūpamā’’^eb^ti vuttā. Anto vuccati lāmakaṭṭhena taṇhā, byantaṃ vigatantaṃ bhūtanti ^b^byantibhūta^eb^nti āha ^b^‘‘vigatantabhūta’’^eb^nti, nittaṇhanti attho.
[06]Dutiyabalasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^29^eb^^b^.^eb^ Navame yasmā mahiddhikapetā devāsurānaṃ āvāhaṃ gacchanti, vivāhaṃ na gacchanti, tasmā pettivisayeneva asurakāyo gahitoti veditabbo. Petāsurā pana petā evāti tesaṃ petehi saṅgaho avuttasiddhova.
[06]Akkhaṇasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^30^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dasame ^a^M3.0235^ea^^b^appicchassā^eb^ti na icchassa. Abhāvattho hettha ^b^appa^eb^saddo ‘‘appaḍaṃsamakasavātātapā’’tiādīsu (a. ni. 10.11) viya. Paccayesu appiccho ^b^paccayappiccho,^eb^ cīvarādipaccayesu icchārahito. ^b^Adhigamappiccho^eb^ti jhānādiadhigamavibhāvane icchārahito ^a^V3.0218^ea^. ^b^Pariyattiappiccho^eb^ti pariyattiyaṃ bāhusaccavibhāvane icchārahito. ^b^Dhutaṅgappiccho^eb^ti dhutaṅgesu appiccho dhutaṅgabhāvavibhāvane icchārahito. ^b^Santaguṇaniguhanenā^eb^ti attani saṃvijjamānānaṃ jhānādiguṇānañceva bāhusaccaguṇassa dhutaṅgaguṇassa ca niguhanena chādanena. ^b^Sampajjatī^eb^ti nipphajjati sijjhati. ^b^No mahicchassā^eb^ti mahatiyā icchāya samannāgatassa no sampajjati anudhammassapi anipphajjanato. ^b^Pavivittassā^eb^ti pakārehi vivittassa. Tenāha ^b^‘‘kāyacittaupadhivivekehi vivittassā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ārambhavatthuvasenā^eb^ti bhāvanābhiyogavasena ekībhāvova kāyavivekoti adhippeto, na gaṇasaṅgaṇikābhāvamattanti dasseti. ^b^Kamma^eb^nti yogakammaṃ.

[03]Sattehi kilesehi ca saṅgaṇanaṃ samodhānaṃ saṅgaṇikā, sā āramitabbaṭṭhena ārāmo etassāti ^b^saṅgaṇikārāmo,^eb^ tassa. Tenāha ^b^‘‘gaṇasaṅgaṇikāya cevā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Āraddhavīriyassā^eb^ti paggahitavīriyassa. Tañca kho upadhiviveke ninnatāvasena ‘‘ayaṃ dhammo’’ti vacanato. Esa nayo itaresupi. Vivaṭṭanissitaṃyeva hi samādhānaṃ idhādhippetaṃ, tathā paññāpi. Kammassa-katapaññāya hi ṭhito kammavasena bhavesu nānappakāro anatthoti jānanto kammakkhayakaraṃ ñāṇaṃ abhipattheti, tadatthañca ussāhaṃ karoti. Mānādayo sattasantānaṃ saṃsāre papañcenti vitthārentīti ^b^papañcā^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘taṇhāmānadiṭṭhipapañcarahitattā’’^eb^tiādi. Sesamettha suviññeyyameva.
[06]Anuruddhamahāvitakkasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Gahapativaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^31-34^eb^^b^.^eb^ Catutthassa ^a^M3.0236^ea^ paṭhame ^b^āsajjā^eb^ti yassa deti, tassa āgamanahetu tena samāgamanimittaṃ. ^b^Bhayā^eb^ti bhayahetu. Nanu bhayaṃ nāma laddhakāmatārāgādayo viya cetanāya avisuddhikaraṃ, taṃ kasmā idha gahitanti? Nayidaṃ tādisaṃ vohārabhayādiṃ sandhāya vuttanti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘ayaṃ adāyako akārako’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Adāsi me^eb^ti yaṃ pubbe kataṃ upakāraṃ cintetvā ^a^V3.0219^ea^ dīyati, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. ^b^Dassati me^eb^ti paccupakārāsīsāya yaṃ dīyati, taṃ sandhāya vadati. ^b^Sāhu dāna^eb^nti dānaṃ nāmetaṃ paṇḍitapaññattanti sādhusamācāre ṭhatvā deti. ^b^Alaṅkārattha^eb^nti upasobhanatthaṃ. Dānañhi datvā taṃ paccavekkhantassa pāmojjapītisomanassādayo uppajjanti, lobhadosaissāmaccherādayopi vidūrī bhavanti. Idāni dānaṃ anukūladhammaparibrūhanena paccanīkadhammavidūrīkaraṇena ca bhāvanācittassa upasobhanāya ca parikkhārāya ca hotīti ^b^‘‘alaṅkāratthañceva parikkhāratthañca detī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘dānañhi cittaṃ muduṃ karotī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Muducitto hoti^eb^ laddhā dāyake ‘‘iminā mayhaṃ saṅgaho kato’’ti, dātāpi laddhari. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘ubhinnampi cittaṃ muduṃ karotī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Adantadamana^eb^nti adantā anassavāpissa dānena dantā assavā honti, vase vattanti. ^b^Adānaṃ dantadūsaka^eb^nti adānaṃ pubbe dantānaṃ assavānampi vighātuppādanena cittaṃ dūseti. ^b^Unnamanti^eb^ dāyakā piyaṃvadā ca paresaṃ garucittīkāraṭṭhānatāya. ^b^Namanti^eb^paṭiggāhakā dānena piyavācāya ca laddhasaṅgahāsaṅgāhakānaṃ.
[03]^b^Cittālaṅkāradānameva uttamaṃ^eb^ anupakkiliṭṭhatāya suparisuddhatāya guṇavisesapaccayatāya ca. Dutiyādīni uttānatthāneva.
[06]Paṭhamadānasuttādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^35^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pañcame ^a^M3.0237^ea^^b^dānapaccayā^eb^ti dānakāraṇā, dānamayapuññassa katattā upacitattāti attho. ^b^Upapattiyo^eb^ti manussesu devesu ca nibbattiyo. ^b^Ṭhapetī^eb^ti ekavārameva anuppajjitvā yathā upari tenevākārena pavattati, evaṃ ṭhapeti. Tadeva cassa adhiṭṭhānanti āha ^b^‘‘tasseva vevacana’’^eb^nti. ^b^Vaḍḍhetī^eb^ti brūheti na hāpeti. ^b^Vimutta^eb^nti adhimuttaṃ, ninnaṃ poṇaṃ pabbhāranti attho. ^b^Vimutta^eb^nti vā vissaṭṭhaṃ. Nippariyāyato ^b^uttari^eb^ nāma paṇītaṃ majjhepi hīnamajjhimavibhāgassa labbhanatoti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘uttari abhāvitanti tato uparimaggaphalatthāya abhāvita’’^eb^nti. ^b^Saṃvattati^eb^ tathāpaṇihitaṃ dānamayaṃ cittaṃ. Yaṃ pana pāḷiyaṃ ^b^‘‘tañca kho’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ, taṃ tatrupapattiyā vibandhakaradussīlyābhāvadassanaparaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, na dānamayassa puññassa kevalassa taṃsaṃvattanatādassanaparanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Samucchinnarāgassā^eb^ti samucchinnakāmarāgassa. Tassa hi ^a^V3.0220^ea^ siyā brahmaloke upapatti, na samucchinnabhavarāgassa. Vītarāgaggahaṇena cettha kāmesu vītarāgatā adhippetā, yāya brahmalokūpapatti siyā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘dānamattenevā’’^eb^tiādi. Yadi evaṃ dānaṃ tattha kimatthiyanti āha ^b^‘‘dānaṃ panā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Dānena muducitto^eb^ti baddhāghāte veripuggalepi attano dānasampaṭicchanena mudubhūtacitto.
[06]Dānūpapattisuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^36^eb^^b^.^eb^ Chaṭṭhe pujjabhavaphalaṃ nibbattenti, attano santānaṃ punantīti vā puññāni ca tāni hetupaccayehi kattabbato kiriyā cāti puññakiriyā, tāyeva ca tesaṃ tesaṃ piyamanāpatādiānisaṃsānaṃ vatthubhāvato ^b^puññakiriyavatthūni^eb^.

[03]Anucchinnabhavamūlassa anuggahavasena, pūjāvasena vā attano deyyadhammassa parassa pariccāgacetanā dīyati etenāti dānaṃ, dānameva ^b^dānamayaṃ^eb^. Padapūraṇamattaṃ maya-saddo. Cīvarādīsu catūsu paccayesu (dī. ni. aṭṭha. 3.305), annādīsu vā ^a^M3.0238^ea^ dasasu dānavatthūsu, rūpādīsu vā chasu ārammaṇesu taṃ taṃ dentassa tesaṃ uppādanato paṭṭhāya pubbabhāge pariccāgakāle pacchā somanassacittena anussaraṇe cāti tīsu kālesu pavattacetanā ^b^dānamayaṃ puññakiriyavatthu^eb^ nāma.

[03]Niccasīlauposathasīlādivasena pañca aṭṭha dasa vā sīlāni samādiyantassa ‘‘sīlapūraṇatthaṃ pabbajissāmī’’ti vihāraṃ gacchantassa pabbajantassa, manorathaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā ‘‘pabbajito vatamhi sādhu suṭṭhū’’ti āvajjentassa, saddhāya pātimokkhaṃ paripūrentassa, paññāya cīvarādike paccaye paccavekkhantassa, satiyā āpāthagatesu rūpādīsu cakkhudvārādīni saṃvarantassa, vīriyena ājīvaṃ sodhentassa ca pavattacetanā sīlati, sīletīti vā ^b^sīlamayaṃ puññakiriyavatthu^eb^ nāma.

[03]^b^Paṭisambhidāyaṃ^eb^ (paṭi. ma. 1.48) vuttena vipassanāmaggena cakkhuṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassantassa, sotaṃ…pe… ghānaṃ…pe… jivhaṃ…pe… kāyaṃ…pe… rūpe…pe… dhamme…pe… cakkhuviññāṇaṃ…pe… manoviññāṇaṃ…pe… cakkhusamphassaṃ ^a^V3.0221^ea^ …pe… manosamphassaṃ…pe… cakkhusamphassajaṃ vedanaṃ…pe… manosamphassajaṃ vedanaṃ…pe… jarāmaraṇaṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassantassa yā cetanā, yā ca pathavīkasiṇādīsu sabbāsu aṭṭhattiṃsāya ārammaṇesu pavattā jhānacetanā, yā ca anavajjesu kammāyatanasippāyatanavijjāṭṭhānesu paricayamanasikārādivasena pavattā cetanā, sabbā sā bhāveti etāyāti bhāvanāmayaṃ vuttanayena puññakiriyavatthu cāti ^b^bhāvanāmayaṃ puññakiriyavatthu^eb^.

[03]Ekamekañcettha yathārahaṃ pubbabhāgato paṭṭhāya karontassa kāyakammaṃ hoti. Tadatthaṃ vācaṃ nicchārentassa vacīkammaṃ. Kāyaṅgaṃ vācaṅgañca acopetvā manasā cintayantassa manokammaṃ. Annādīni dentassa cāpi ‘‘annadānādīni demī’’ti vā, dānapāramiṃ āvajjetvā vā dānakāle dānamayaṃ puññakiriyavatthu hoti. Yathā hi kevalaṃ ‘‘annadānādīni demī’’ti dānakāle dānamayaṃ puññakiriyavatthu hoti, evaṃ ‘‘idaṃ dānamayaṃ sammāsambodhiyā paccayo hotū’’ti dānapāramiṃ āvajjetvā dānakālepi dānasīseneva pavattitattā. Vattasīse ṭhatvā dadanto ‘‘etaṃ dānaṃ nāma mayhaṃ ^a^M3.0239^ea^ kulavaṃsahetu paveṇicāritta’’nti cārittasīsena vā dento cārittasīlattā sīlamayaṃ. Khayato vayato sammasanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā dadato bhāvanāmayaṃ puññakiriyavatthu hoti. Yathā hi deyyadhammapariccāgavasena vattamānāpi dānacetanā vattasīse ṭhatvā dadato sīlamayaṃ puññakiriyavatthu hoti pubbābhisaṅkhārassa aparabhāge cetanāya ca tathāpavattattā.
[06]Puññakiriyavatthusuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^37-38^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sattame ^b^viceyya detī^eb^ti ettha dve vicinanāni dakkhiṇeyyavicinanaṃ, dakkhiṇāvicinanañca. Tesu vipannasīle ito bahiddhā pañcanavuti pāsaṇḍabhede ca dakkhiṇeyye pahāya sīlādiguṇasampannānaṃ sāsane pabbajitānaṃ dānaṃ ^b^dakkhiṇeyyavicinanaṃ^eb^ nāma. Lāmakalāmake paccaye apanetvā paṇītapaṇīte vicinitvā tesaṃ dānaṃ ^b^dakkhiṇāvicinanaṃ^eb^ nāma. Tenāha ^b^‘‘imassa dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ bhavissatī’’^eb^tiādi. Aṭṭhame natthi vattabbaṃ.
[06]Sappurisadānasuttādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^39-40^eb^^b^.^eb^ Navame ^a^V3.0222^ea^^b^puññābhisandā^eb^ti puññanadiyo. ^b^Kusalābhisandā^eb^ti kusalānaṃ pavāhā. ^b^Sukhassāhārā^eb^ti sukhapaccayā. Aggānīti ñātattā ^b^aggaññāni^eb^. Cirarattaṃ ñātattā ^b^rattaññāni^eb^. Ariyānaṃ sādhūnaṃ vaṃsānīti ñātattā ^b^vaṃsaññāni^eb^. Porāṇānaṃ ādipurisānaṃ etānīti ^b^porāṇāni^eb^. Sabbaso kenacipi pakārena sādhūhi na kiṇṇāni na khittāni chaḍḍitānīti ^b^asaṃkiṇṇāni^eb^. Ayañca nayo nesaṃ yathā atīte, evaṃ etarahi anāgate cāti āha ^b^‘‘asaṃkiṇṇapubbāni na saṃkiyanti na saṃkiyissantī’’^eb^ti. Tato eva ^b^appaṭikuṭṭhāni^eb^. Na hi kadāci viññū samaṇabrāhmaṇā hiṃsādipāpadhammaṃ anujānanti. ^b^Aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ abhayaṃ detī^eb^ti sabbesu ^a^M3.0240^ea^ bhūtesu nihitadaṇḍattā sakalassapi sattakāyassa bhayābhāvaṃ deti. ^b^Avera^eb^nti verābhāvaṃ. ^b^Abyābajjha^eb^nti niddukkhataṃ. Evamettha saṅkhepato pāḷivaṇṇanā veditabbā. Dasame natthi vattabbaṃ.
[06]Abhisandasuttādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Dānavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^41-48^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pañcamassa paṭhamādīsu natthi vattabbaṃ. Chaṭṭhe (saṃ. ni. ṭī. 1.1.165) pañca aṅgāni etassāti pañcaṅgaṃ, pañcaṅgameva pañcaṅgikaṃ, tassa ^b^pañcaṅgikassa^eb^. Mahatī daddarī vīṇāvisesopi ^b^ātatamevā^eb^ti ^b^‘‘cammapariyonaddhesū’’^eb^ti visesanaṃ kataṃ. ^b^Ekatalatūriyaṃ^eb^ kumbhathunadaddarikādi. ^b^Ubhayatalaṃ^eb^ bherimudiṅgādi. Cammapariyonaddhaṃ hutvā vinibaddhaṃ ^b^ātatavitataṃ^eb^. ^b^Sabbaso pariyonaddhaṃ^eb^ nāma caturassāmbaṇaṃ paṇavādi ca. Gomukhīādīnampi ettheva saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Vaṃsādī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena saṅkhādīnaṃ saṅgaho. ^b^Sammādī^eb^ti sammatāḷakaṃsatāḷasilāsalākatāḷādi. Tattha ^b^sammatāḷaṃ^eb^ nāma dantamayatāḷaṃ. ^b^Kaṃsatāḷaṃ^eb^ lohamayaṃ. Silāmayaṃ ayopattena ca vādanatāḷaṃ ^b^silāsalākatāḷaṃ. Sumucchitassā^eb^ti suṭṭhu paṭiyattassa. ^b^Pamāṇe^eb^ti ^a^V3.0223^ea^ nātidaḷhanātisithilasaṅkhāte majjhime mucchanāpamāṇe. ^b^Cheko^eb^ti paṭu paṭṭho. So cassa paṭubhāvo manoharoti āha ^b^‘‘sundaro’’^eb^ti. ^b^Rañjetu^eb^nti rāgaṃ uppādetuṃ. ^b^Khamatevā^eb^ti rocateva. ^b^Na nibbindatī^eb^ti na tajjeti, sotasukhabhāvato piyāyitabbova hoti.

[03]^b^Bhattāraṃ nātimaññatī^eb^ti sāmikaṃ muñcitvā aññaṃ manasāpi na pattheti. ^b^Uṭṭhāhikā^eb^ti uṭṭhānavīriyasampannā. ^b^Analasā^eb^ti nikkosajjā. ^b^Saṅgahitaparijjanā^eb^ti sammānanādīhi ceva chaṇādīsu pesetabba-piyabhaṇḍādipaṇṇākārapesanādīhi ca saṅgahitaparijanā. Idha ^b^parijano^eb^ nāma sāmikassa ceva ^a^M3.0241^ea^ attano ca ñātijano. ^b^Sambhata^eb^nti kasivaṇijjādīni katvā ābhatadhanaṃ. Sattamaṭṭhamāni uttānatthāni.
[06]Saṃkhittūposathasuttādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^49-50^eb^^b^.^eb^ Navame ^b^idhalokavijayāyā^eb^ti idhalokavijinanatthāya abhibhavatthāya. Yo hi diṭṭhadhammikaṃ anatthaṃ parivajjanavasena abhibhavati, tato eva tadatthaṃ sampādeti, so idhalokavijayāya paṭipanno nāma hoti paccatthikaniggaṇhanato sadatthasampādanato ca. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ayaṃsa loko āraddho hotī’’^eb^ti. (Pasaṃsāvahato tayidaṃ pasaṃsāvahanaṃ kittisaddena idhaloke saddānaṃ cittatosanaviddheyyabhāvāpādanena ca hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.) ^b^Susaṃvihitakammanto^eb^ti yāgubhattapacanakālādīni anatikkamitvā tassa tassa sādhukaṃ karaṇena suṭṭhu saṃvihitakammanto. ^b^Paralokavijayāyā^eb^ti paralokassa vijinanatthāya abhibhavatthāya. Yo hi samparāyikaṃ anatthaṃ parivajjanavasena abhibhavati, tato eva tadatthaṃ sampādeti, so paralokavijayāya paṭipanno nāma hoti. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānameva.
[06]Paṭhamaidhalokikasuttādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Uposathavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Paṭhamapaṇṇāsakaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03]^b^51-53^eb^^b^.^eb^ Chaṭṭhassa ^a^V3.0224^ea^^a^M3.0242^ea^ paṭhame (sārattha. ṭī. cūḷavagga 3.402) ^b^gotamī^eb^ti gottaṃ. Nāmakaraṇadivase panassā laddhasakkārā brāhmaṇā lakkhaṇasampattiṃ disvā ‘‘sace ayaṃ dhītaraṃ labhissati, cakkavattirañño mahesī bhavissati. Sace puttaṃ labhissati, cakkavattirājā bhavissatīti ubhayathāpi mahatīyevassā pajā bhavissatī’’ti byākariṃsu. Athassā ‘‘mahāpajāpatī’’ti nāmaṃ akaṃsu. Tenāha ^b^‘‘puttapajāya ceva dhītupajāya ca mahantattā evaṃladdhanāmā’’^eb^ti.
[21]‘‘Attadaṇḍā bhayaṃ jātaṃ, janaṃ passatha medhagaṃ;
[22]Saṃvegaṃ kittayissāmi, yathā saṃvijitaṃ mayā’’ti. (su. ni. 941; mahāni. 170) –

[07]Ādinā ^b^attadaṇḍasuttaṃ kathesi^eb^. Taṃtaṃpalobhanakiriyā kāyavācāhi parakkamantiyo ukkaṇṭhantūti sāsanaṃ pesenti nāmāti katvā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘sāsanaṃ pesetvā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Kuṇāladaha^eb^nti kuṇāladahatīraṃ. ^b^Anabhiratiṃ vinodetvā^eb^ti itthīnaṃ dosadassanamukhena kāmānaṃ vokārasaṃkilesavibhāvanena anabhiratiṃ vinodetvā.

[03]^b^Āpādikā^eb^ti saṃvaddhakā, tumhākaṃ hatthapādesu kiccaṃ asādhentesu hatthe ca pāde ca vaḍḍhetvā paṭijaggitāti attho. ^b^Posikā^eb^ti divasassa dve tayo vāre nahāpetvā bhojetvā pāyetvā tumhe posesi. ^b^Thaññaṃ pāyesī^eb^ti nandakumāro kira bodhisattato katipāheneva daharo, tasmiṃ jāte mahāpajāpatī attano puttaṃ dhātīnaṃ datvā sayaṃ bodhisattassa dhātikiccaṃ sādhayamānā attano thaññaṃ pāyesi. Taṃ sandhāya thero evamāha. ^b^Daharo^eb^ti taruṇo. ^b^Yuvā^eb^ti yobbaññe ^a^V3.0225^ea^ ṭhito. ^b^Maṇḍanakajātiko^eb^ti alaṅkārasabhāvo. Tattha koci taruṇopi yuvā na hoti yathā atitaruṇo. Koci yuvāpi maṇḍanakajātiko na hoti yathā upasantasabhāvo, ālasiyabyasanādīhi vā abhibhūto. Idha pana daharo ^a^M3.0243^ea^ ceva yuvā ca maṇḍanakajātiko ca adhippeto, tasmā evamāha. Uppalādīni maṇḍanakajātiko ca lokasammatattā vuttāni.

[03]^b^Mātugāmassa pabbajitattā^eb^ti idaṃ pañcavassasatato uddhaṃ aṭṭhatvā pañcasuyeva vassasatesu saddhammaṭṭhitiyā kāraṇanidassanaṃ. ^b^Paṭisambhidāpabhedappattakhīṇāsavavaseneva vutta^eb^nti ettha paṭisambhidāppattakhīṇāsavaggahaṇena jhānānipi gahitāneva honti. Na hi nijjhānakānaṃ sabbappakārasampatti ijjhatīti vadanti. ^b^Sukkhavipassakakhīṇāsavavasena vassasahassa^eb^ntiādinā ca yaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ khandhakabhāṇakānaṃ matena vuttanti veditabbaṃ. ^b^Vinayaṭṭhakathāya^eb^mpi (cūḷava. aṭṭha. 403) imināva nayena vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ (dī. ni. aṭṭha. 3.161) pana ‘‘paṭisambhidāppattehi vassasahassaṃ aṭṭhāsi, chaḷabhiññehi vassasahassaṃ, tevijjehi vassasahassaṃ, sukkhavipassakehi vassasahassaṃ, pātimokkhena vassasahassaṃ aṭṭhāsī’’ti vuttaṃ. Idhāpi ^b^sāsanantaradhānakathāyaṃ^eb^ (a. ni. aṭṭha. 1.1.130) ‘‘buddhānañhi parinibbānato vassasahassameva paṭisambhidā nibbattetuṃ sakkonti, tato paraṃ cha abhiññā, tato tāpi nibbattetuṃ asakkontā tisso vijjā nibbattenti, gacchante gacchante kāle tāpi nibbattetuṃ asakkontā sukkhavipassakā honti. Eteneva upāyena anāgāmino, sakadāgāmino, sotāpannā’’ti vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Saṃyuttanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ (saṃ. ni. aṭṭha. 2.2.156) pana ‘‘paṭhamabodhiyañhi bhikkhū paṭisambhidāppattā ahesuṃ. Atha kāle gacchante paṭisambhidā pāpuṇituṃ na sakkhiṃsu, chaḷabhiññā ahesuṃ. Tato cha abhiññā pattuṃ asakkontā tisso vijjā pāpuṇiṃsu. Idāni kāle gacchante tisso vijjā pāpuṇituṃ asakkontā āsavakkhayamattaṃ pāpuṇissanti, tampi asakkontā anāgāmiphalaṃ, tampi asakkontā sakadāgāmiphalaṃ, tampi asakkontā sotāpattiphalaṃ, gacchante kāle sotāpattiphalampi pattuṃ na sakkhissantī’’ti vuttaṃ. Yasmā cetaṃ sabbaṃ aññamaññappaṭiviruddhaṃ, tasmā tesaṃ tesaṃ bhāṇakānaṃ matameva ācariyena tattha tattha dassitanti gahetabbaṃ. Aññathā hi ācariyasseva pubbāparavirodhappasaṅgo siyāti.

[03]^b^Tāniyevā^eb^ti ^a^M3.0244^ea^ tāniyeva pañcavassasahassāni. Pariyattimūlakaṃ sāsananti āha ^b^‘‘na hi pariyattiyā^eb^^a^V3.0226^ea^^b^asati paṭivedho atthī’’^eb^tiādi. Pariyattiyā hi antarahitāya paṭipattiantaradhāyati, paṭipattiyā antarahitāya adhigamo antaradhāyati. Kiṃkāraṇā? Ayañhi pariyatti paṭipattiyā paccayo hoti, paṭipatti adhigamassa. Iti paṭipattitopi pariyattiyeva pamāṇaṃ. Dutiyatatiyesu natthi vattabbaṃ.
[06]Gotamīsuttādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^54-55^eb^^b^.^eb^ Catutthe (dī. ni. aṭṭha. 3.265) ^b^ekena bhoge bhuñjeyyā^eb^ti ekena koṭṭhāsena bhoge bhuñjeyya, vinibhuñjeyya vāti attho. ^b^Dvīhi kamma^eb^nti dvīhi koṭṭhāsehi kasivaṇijjādikammaṃ payojeyya. ^b^Nidhāpeyyā^eb^ti catutthakoṭṭhāsaṃ nidhetvā ṭhapeyya, nidahitvā bhūmigataṃ katvā ṭhapeyyāti attho. ^b^Āpadāsu bhavissatī^eb^ti kulānañhi na sabbakālaṃ ekasadisaṃ vattati, kadāci rājāggicoradubbhikkhādivasena āpadā uppajjanti, tasmā evaṃ āpadāsu uppannāsu bhavissatīti ekaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ nidhāpeyyāti vuttaṃ. Imesu pana catūsu koṭṭhāsesu kataraṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ gahetvā kusalaṃ kātabbanti? ‘‘Bhoge bhuñjeyyā’’ti vuttakoṭṭhāsaṃ. Tato gaṇhitvā hi bhikkhūnampi kapaṇaddhikānampi dānaṃ dātabbaṃ, pesakāranhāpitādīnampi vetanaṃ dātabbaṃ. Samaṇabrāhmaṇakapaṇaddhikādīnaṃ dānavasena ceva, adhivatthadevatādīnaṃ petabalivasena, nhāpitādīnaṃ vetanavasena ca viniyogopi upayogo eva.
[03]Apenti gacchanti, apentā vā etehīti apāyā, apāyā eva mukhāni dvārānīti ^b^apāyamukhāni. Vināsadvārānī^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. Pañcame natthi vattabbaṃ.
[06]Dīghajāṇusuttādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^56-58^eb^^b^.^eb^ Chaṭṭhe ^a^M3.0245^ea^ gabbhavāso idha uttarapadalopena gabbho vuttoti āha ^b^‘‘gabbhoti gabbhavāso’’^eb^ti. Sattamaṭṭhamāni uttānatthāni.
[06]Bhayasuttādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^59-60^eb^^b^.^eb^ Navame ^a^V3.0227^ea^^b^dānaṃ dadantāna^eb^nti dakkhiṇeyyaṃ uddissa dānaṃ dentānaṃ. Upadhī vipaccanti etena, upadhīsu vā vipaccati, upadhayo vā vipākā etassāti ^b^upadhivipākaṃ. Saṅghe dinnaṃ mahapphala^eb^nti ariyasaṅghe dinnaṃ vipphāraṭṭhānaṃ hoti, vipulaphalanti attho. Dasame natthi vattabbaṃ.
[06]Puggalasuttādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Gotamīvaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^61-65^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sattamassa paṭhamādīni suviññeyyāni. Pañcame (dīṇi.ṭī. 2.173) abhibhavatīti abhibhu, parikammaṃ, ñāṇaṃ vā. Abhibhu āyatanaṃ etassāti ^b^abhibhāyatanaṃ,^eb^ jhānaṃ. Abhibhavitabbaṃ vā ārammaṇasaṅkhātaṃ āyatanaṃ etassāti ^b^abhibhāyatanaṃ^eb^. Atha vā ārammaṇābhibhavanato abhitu ca taṃ āyatanañca yogino sukhavisesānaṃ adhiṭṭhānabhāvato manāyatanadhammāyatanabhāvato cātipi sasampayuttajjhānaṃ ^b^abhibhāyatanaṃ^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘abhibhavanakāraṇānī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Tāni hī^eb^ti abhibhāyatanasaññitāni jhānāni. ‘‘Puggalassa ñāṇuttariyatāyā’’ti idaṃ ubhayatthāpi yojetabbaṃ. Kathaṃ? ^b^Paṭipakkhabhāvena paccanīkadhamme abhibhavanti puggalassa ñāṇuttariyatāya ārammaṇāni abhibhavanti^eb^. Ñāṇabaleneva hi ārammaṇābhibhavanaṃ viya paṭipakkhābhibhavopīti.

[03]^b^Parikammavasena^eb^^a^M3.0246^ea^^b^ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññī,^eb^ na appanāvasena. Na hi paṭibhāganimittārammaṇā appanā ajjhattavisayā sambhavati. ^b^Taṃ pana^eb^ ajjhattaparikammavasena laddhaṃ kasiṇanimittaṃ ^b^avisuddhameva hoti,^eb^ na bahiddhāparikammavasena laddhaṃ viya visuddhaṃ.
